The tiny fibers can end up in baby's mouth but are way too small to cause any kind of choking hazard. I would recommend washing the outfit first before wearing. If the fibers bother you, don't purchase. It should also be noted that this outfit does not come with white socks. For the price at this time of this review ($14, shipped in two days with prime) I find it to be a bargain. If you're thinking about this as a Halloween outfit you should definitely buy a few weeks in advance. It'll give you enough time to test it out first and make sure it fits so you have enough time to buy another one if it doesn't.
summary: Super soft, warm, and comfortable for baby!  Does shed a slight bit so one star off.

I was worried that they might be a little short (I'm 5'8") but the length was actually perfect! The material quality and construction are excellent. The cloth is thick, slightly shiny like in the picture, sturdy, and has a nice soft lining. These feel more like high-quality jeans than leggings - they do stretch, but not anywhere near as much as most leggings. Highly recommend checking the size chart in the description before ordering. Go by their measurements and you'll get an accurate fit. Colors are stunning and don't turn white when stretched. Also, there are front and back pockets! They're a useful size but don't protrude and mess up the silhouette. I'm going to be keeping an eye on this brand...

Just purchased these in black.  Love them!  I've worn them all day at work several times now and my feet don't hurt at all. The fit as expected and aren't to narrow or too short.  I have slightly wide feet (I'm related to ducks), so sometimes I have problems with shoes running too narrow.  Not these.  My only problem with these booties is the in-step.  I have a very high in-step and they're a little tight across the top of my foot.  This isn't a problem with the shoe, it's just my duck feet.  If you also have a high in-step, it's something to consider.  I'm hoping they'll stretch out soon (I've only had them one week) and this won't be a problem.  Will definitely buy more of these in different colors.

reviewText: This is an awesome knit hat! It arrived very quickly and is adorable and very well made. It looks hand knitted and the stitching is very nice and the yarn is soft and thick. It folds up at the bottom for an extra layer of warmth and protection over your ears. There is no lining inside, just the knit fabric but it is not itchy at all, in fact the yarn is very soft that they used to make it with. The color is true on the website photo, I ordered the brown color. I love it and will get a lot of use out of it this winter because it's both stylish and warm! I received a discount for my honest review and I would have no problem recommending this to anyone, it's a very nice hat!

Such a cute hat! It's currently 90 degrees in NC, but it won't be in a few months, and I have my hat ready to go. It fits my big head perfectly, since it's a stretchy knit - (from ultra soft acrylic yarn.) The cuff is adjustable, which makes it suitable for juniors and adults. The color is flexible, too. It seems like a grayish tan, too me.

I checked the knit, and the seams and they appear to be well done. The knit is very elastic and returns to its previous shape when stretched. I have not washed the hat, but it probably should be handwashed with cool water to avoid pilling.

My hat was provided to me at a discount, in exchange for my honest review. For the purpose of my reviews, I do not consider price. I feel the assessment should focus on things like appearace, durability, quality, and how well the item matches the seller's description. In this case, I'm pleased with all aspects of the product. I'm giving it the full 5 stars.

If you have questions about the hat, I'll do my best to answer them. You can post them on this listing, or email me at: Redsedso@outlook.com

Unfortunately, I immediately removed the "leather" label on the hat so I had altered it even before I started wearing it...drat! But for you possible buyers, BEWARE of this REALLY CUTE hat!!!  When it arrived, there were several "eyelashes"  already loose on the outside, so I took it outdoors and shook it hard until no more loose ones came off. Then, I put on a comfy black sleep cap first for extra warmth in the sub-zero temperatures and donned my new hat.  (This method also helped to secure this rather large hat.)  I was very pleased how nicely it went with my mostly gunmetal winter coat until, at the end of the day, there were several "eyelashes" stuck to my nice coat.  It got worse and worse the more I wore it and now I call the "eyelashes" CHICKEN FEATHERS because it reminds me of an old down-filled pillow that sheds like mad and needs new ticking! It's driving me crazy...all over my black silk turtleneck, my black pants, the floor, the furniture...even on my cat! They float happily in the air and I FEEL LIKE I SHOULD KEEP A LINT ROLLER & A CAR VAC ON MY PERSON AT ALL TIMES.  It truly is laughable that these "eyelashes" are just slipped under a single strand of yarn and not secured in any way. It's a very darling hat  and the ample pompom is lovely too.  I'm wondering if even washing it in a mesh bag on the delicate setting and air-drying it (with maybe a minute in a cool dryer to puff up the pompom afterwards) will help secure these chicken feathers, but I'm not betting on it. I'll bet instead that this hat will lose all its eyelashes before winter ends! Already, it's looking pretty pathetic and I'm tempted to remove all the yarn bits by hand because so many of them are HALF falling out, which IS totally tacky-looking....Just don't be like me and take the label off so you can return it if you choose to buy this item. [Actually, I think I did Funky Junque a favor by not advertising a poorly-conceived AND VERY poorly-executed product!]

I loved this hat, the texture is beautiful and the fit is great. The pom-pom fits nicely on the crown of my head and the body of the hat is very high quality. This is a total  and I do mean TOTAL  copycat rip-off of an indie designer's work. She goes by the name of Velvet Acorn and her knitting/crochet patterns are up on Etsy and Ravelry.com (see attached photo for evidence). I can guarantee they are not licensed for production at $10/pop from some random startup on Amazon. Please do not support the theft of others' work. Yes, it's an adorable hat, and your child will surely look adorable in it... but please think beyond that. Supporting these rip-off "artists" just leads to them doing it even more.

I'm not affiliated with her in any way, but if some random operation was taking my creative work and turning a profit off of it, I'd be livid!

If you HAVE to have it, buy the pattern from the creator and ask one of your grandmas or cool nieces (or nephews!) to knit it for you. Hell, I'll knit it for you!
summary: Yes, it's cute. But your kid looks a lot sweeter in something that's not stolen.

summary: Fits the whole family... except the 4-year old.

reviewText:
I don't make a habit of writing bad reviews, but this vendor has given me no choice. I purchased a hoodie, size women's XXL, as a Christmas present for relative. When she opened her present, the hoodie had an XXL tag but was clearly multiple sizes too small. A tape measure verified that it was, in fact, fully 5" narrower than multiple XXL hoodies we compared it against. No problem, right? Contact the vendor, find out if the hoodie was simply mislabeled or whether they all run small, and then either exchange or return the item. Sounds easy.

I've contacted this vendor three times with detailed information. For their part, they have ignored me. No assistance, no form email, no your-problem-not-ours message, nothing. They have simply ignored me.

So, I contacted the vendor requesting authorization and a prepaid packing slip to return the hoodie. I have now requested this not once but twice. No packing slip, no form email, no nothing. They are simply ignoring me, apparently hoping I'll just go away.

I have now filed a claim through Amazon. To their credit, Amazon has always been responsive to customer issues and usually brings a quick resolution. I expect they will help put this right.

And so, I'm posting this warning - Do NOT, repeat NOT, do business with this vendor. Their merchandise can't be trusted, and the vendor  doesn't give a hang about their customers. They won't even honor their posted obligation of allowing merchandise to be returned.

If you have $48 burning a hole in your pocket, don't waste it here. Give it to your favorite charity and know that somebody will benefit from it. Or donate it to a crooked political candidate - at least you'll get a tax credit that way. And who knows, maybe the politician will actually keep his promise, which is more than this vendor will do.

reviewText: Ordered this item looked very nice in the picture loved the feet on it and the design of the dog , well what I received was not what I ordered I got the same color but it was a different design on it no footsie on the one that was sent and I just can't believe I ordered one thing and they sent me something I didn't order its sad because now my son is out an outfit in these cold winters I ordered what I ordered for a reason thanks a lot worthless to order from these guys you won't get what you order

**Order a size up if your little one has a long torso. They are made short and wide!**Superior quality materials though!!**

Aside from the fit, this is just the most perfect blanket-soft romper. And, so adorable! My baby liked wearing it. It kept her very warm and cozy on our sail boat on a cold windy day. My 3 year old son enjoyed seeing the monkey on her too.

 My baby is 10 months old and has a long torso and average legs. We got the 12 month size and noticed right away that it was short and wide, much like other rompers I have purchased from a company in China. The hood was a nice fit around her head, but it didn't reach up high enough. It was just riding up in the rear a bit and I could just barely get the suit comfortably around her shoulders and buttoned up all the way. The bottom hem was just the right length for her to stand (and walk if she could) It won't fit her much longer, but it would have been great for her a few months ago. I don't mind the width of the suit at all, it just looks really cute and cozy with the extra material on the side.

I have 3 kids, and I have never come across a romper that is so luxuriously soft, thick, high quality! (And I've had a lot of cozy fuzzy rompers) You only see things this soft in an actually baby blanket! It's boutique quality - lined with very nice soft cotton, so your baby won't sweat and be uncomfortable. And if it's really cold out, you can flip the whole thing inside out. It's completely reversible, so your baby can experience that soft fuzzy material on the skin. I love that feature!

The snaps are unlike any snaps I've ever seen on clothing. They are way way better than the basic metal snaps you see on most US brands. These snaps are plastic and are very strong and durable. They won't be cold on baby's skin and they are just overall way better than the metal kind.

I do not dare put this in the dryer because I want the blanketed material to stay super soft. Sometimes drying blankets can lessen the softness and cause a worn out, fuzzy look. *Machine wash cold and hang dry.*
summary: **Order a size up if your little one has a long torso. They are made short and wide!**Superior quality materials though!!**

reviewText: Material is a little thin.
I bought this for Halloween.  It comes very large.  It is cute though!

My coworkers all dressed as Carebears for a Halloween contest and we came in second.  I'm 5'2 and 148 lb with a booty and even with jeans and a t-shirt under it, it's a little large all the way around.  They must have taken cues from MC Hammer because the crotch is really low, making full strides impossible, perhaps the goal was to make you waddle more like a bear?  The snaps are really far apart so I had to wear something under the costume which was too warm for the office but really comfortable when trick-or-treating with my daughter that night, especially since it has pockets tucked into the side seams.  The icon on the tummy is felt and looks great but it's sewn onto another piece of felt that wraps over the snaps and has it's own snaps (also far apart) to hold it on.  I used stick-on velcro between the snaps to hold things closed which worked for the day but going to the bathroom was a pain.  Wearing as pajamas is really comfortable on a cold day and the pockets are truly my favorite part.  I really should sew on the velcro but I don't lounge in it often enough to make it worthwhile.
The size chart provided was not accurate. The chart recommended medium for someone at least 6'3. The chart should have also included waist size. The product did not fit.

reviewText:
I received my brown leather belt yesterday and wanted to provide some feedback to help other shoppers with their purchase. The belt arrived in brand new condition and was extremely well packaged. The belt did arrive a little late and the shipping time was quite long. Once I received the box I realized that this is because it is coming directly from China.

Quality:
The belt itself appears to be very high quality. I really like the subtle pattern on the leather, and overall was impressed with the feel and appearance of this belt for the price. It appears that it will stand up very well to wear and tear based on the craftsmanship.

Size:
The length of the belt was perfect for me and the size I ordered. Note that this belt is a thin style. I have included a reference quarter in the pictures to help illustrate the thickness and size.

Smell:
The only downside to this belt (and the reason for the 4 star rating) is the smell. When I opened the box a sweet grassy smell was coming out of the box. I think that this may have something to do with the length of shipping time and the fact that a deodorizer was not included in the package, but I can't wear this out in public until the product airs out. I used some leather cleaner to help reduce the smell which seemed to help a lot.

Overall Summary:
If you are looking for a high quality belt at a very reasonable price and you don't mind waiting a bit longer for shipping than this belt is a great choice. I would also allow a couple of days for the belt to air out before use. I did receive this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. I always provide honest feedback to help other Amazon shoppers and am committed to maintain the review integrity. Thank you very much for reading and happy shopping!
summary: A very nice belt with a couple of drawbacks.

reviewText: First, I want to let you know I've been asked to review some products sold on Amazon and receive them for free or at a discount to enable me to evaluate them in daily use. My review is unbiased and based on the product's performance as sold on Amazon. This is the third Buyreal belt I've ordered for my hubby. He loved the first two, so I decided to check out another style and color. He is picky and hates cheap belts that start pulling apart at the holes after a few months. Like most men, he rotates wearing the same couple of belts every single day until they start to show wear and then he sends me shopping for a new one. He only likes 1 out of 10 belts I bring home, so it was a big deal that he liked the first Buyreal belt I brought home. This belt comes in a nice tin box appropriate for gift giving. The belt is rolled inside with tissue paper. This style has a modern feel, with a nice, rich, real leather matte finish. No shiny plastic look to the leather. The buckle is a silver that doesn't look or feel cheap. The sizing is right one, so if you fluctuate order one size larger. The interior has a nice finish and is stamped that it is real leather. The leather band is a nice width and thickness. I expect it to last many years. The original belt I received from Amazon had a dented tin and the belt had a dark stain near the front, which hubby wasn't happy about. I contacted the seller and they were very responsive. They immediately arranged for me to exchange the original belt. The replacement had no problems. I was barely able to take a picture before hubby grabbed it out of my hands. The Tan color is very rich looking...I'm trying to think of the right color to describe it. Sort of a burnt sienna color, not tan, not rust. Very RL country estate color. I don't think you'll be disappointed.
summary: Rich Color and Leather, Modern Design.

reviewText: Excellent

The BuyReal Generic Genuine Leather Dress Belt for Men arrived on time and in good condition.  This was in a beautiful black tin box, including tissue, that would make a great gift presentation.  The belt is full grain leather. It features the single prong buckle style with a polished silver, nickel free buckle. The belt is a little over an inch wide.  I purchased the coffee color and it's very attractive. It's very flexible and has classic style.  This is a nice thickness of reinforced leather and the side stitches are very strong and give it an added clean, sleek look.

My husband can go thru some belts!  When searching for something that might be strong and as attractive and not bulky or stiff I came across this.  I ordered it and I'm very impressed with the quality.  This holds it's shape as far as height is concerned, but very flexible and comfortable around the waist.  Unfortunately, I purchased my husband's size 44 because my husband's size is 42 and that wasn't avaiable, and it is too small.  The sizing is small so be aware of that.

There are different styles and the fit can vary.  I don't care so much for the style with the elastic bands in the back as they don't seem to give me the firm fit I need.  I'm in strong winds at times and the firmer fit is the way to go.  Like I said, I got a number of headbands and it took some time to get what I wanted, but Amazon and the sellers were very good about accepting returns and exchanges.

I have never been a fan of a reversible belt. There.! .... I said it.!!!
Having said that, this belt has gone a long way toward changing my mind. I REALLY like the idea. One nice belt to mix and match with two different colors. It's hard to imagine a better idea. The problem has always been the belt never lives up to the expectation.!!  In this case however, it comes close, REALLY close.!!

This belt is the traditional black/brown with a buckle that pivots to allow the choice. PERFECT.!!  Well, yeah... mostly. Problems always seem to occur when the belt has been used for a few weeks and the buckle loosens up on the pivot, or it loosens up on the belt. This one seems to have solved (maybe..??) those issues.

I have been on a quest for a belt for several months. I have purchased several (MANY..!!) and am still looking. I now own at least a dozen and none of them are perfect. A couple are close.... the rest are mediocre or poor, depending on how you look at things. This belt is one of the better ones. It's not perfect, but then...??  I like the color saturation on both sides. The buckle appears to be nicely done and seems to be well mounted. I managed to order and get the right size (lucky, I guess..) and it arrived in good shape.

What makes this belt better than most is the performance. It just seems to work. the leather is nicely finished and the color on both sides is deep and uniform. The buckle pivots cleanly and snaps into position like it should. Overall, it's just a nicely done belt.

Problems... Well, there really aren't any. At least right now. I am not particularly enamored with the thickness of the belt (it seems thin..??). The anchors that hold the buckle are tiny and questionable. And the belt seems to take a "set" quickly. All of this is not new to those among us who wear belts (especially leather belts..). So, I can't really say that I dislike anything...... so far.

I am giving this belt four stars for its initial performance and looks. If it continues in the same way, I will be very pleased indeed.!!  If not, I will come back here and update the review.  For now, four stars for a nice belt and a good value.
*Product furnished for review. This is it. My evaluation. My words. Enough said.

The Ponosoon Sports Sunglasses are a fairly terrific pair of sunglasses that have 5 interchangeable lenses, a nice carrying case and even a cloth to keep your lens clean and fresh looking. The different lens come in quite handy depending on the time of day you use the glasses, and the glasses are very lightweight which is really important for people who use them for undertaking long exercises. The price is also fairly reasonable for everything that you receive.

 I use these glasses frequently for cycling, running, and even just to wear around outside the house to shield my eyes from the sun. I wear these glasses outside often and worry very little about harmful rays ruining my eyes; the glasses allow just enough sun through the lenses and keep the rest out. The set also comes with a really nice hard case that allows you to take them on trips without fear of breaking, and also comes with a cloth case that makes travel lighter and more compact. The glasses are also unisex so both men and women can wear them and they look stylish and comfortable.

As an overview, these glasses are a very nice product for the price that you pay. Im a long distance cyclist and enjoy wearing them with every ride, but runners or any outdoorsy people would have luck with these glasses.

Disclaimer: I received this item at a discount for my honest and unbiased review. I was not influenced in any way or by anyone of my opinion of this product.
summary: Good product for the price you pay

reviewText:
Nice variety of lenses, although only one set (grey) is actually polarized.  The frame itself is a bit flimsy, which makes changing lenses a bit difficult, and when taking them on/off, the flex in the frame doesn't allow you to easily put them on one-handed.  The adjustable nose piece is ok, but is almost too easy to adjust and occasionally gets knocked out of place.

For my face, they don't cover my full peripheral vision, and they tend to sit a bit too far away from my checkbones to have what I consider a perfect fit.  Otherwise, they are comfortable and stay put, with the rubber nose piece and the rubber on the arms providing decent grip.  If you want just a cheap pair of sunglasses with the flexibility of the various lenses and a nice case, these are worth looking into.  By all means they aren't "designer" quality, but they're as good as any other $20 sunglasses I've purchased and you do get a lot for your money.

If style and perfect fit is absolutely the highest priority, you probably won't like these, but if that's you, then you probably shouldn't be buying a no-name brand online and hoping they fit perfectly.  Of course, everyone's face is different so they might fit you better than me.

I received this product free or nearly free in order to evaluate and provide my opinion.  A positive review was not required for me to receive this product and my review is my own personal opinion.
summary: A good value and decent quality, though the fit for me isn't "just right", it's still decent.

reviewText: This Ponosoon set of sports sunglasses is designed more for outdoor lovers that for regular commuters like me. This is a beautifully packaged set of sunglasses and accessories that come with nearly everything you need. They arrive in a cushioned case that contains instructions, the sunglasses, a total of five pairs of interchangeable lenses, carrying pouch, a lanyard to wear them around your neck and a cleaning cloth. The glasses themselves are the clip over style, where you can wear glasses underneath, with the shade lenses over them. The frames have rubber tips on the inside of the ear hook sections. This set of glasses are aimed at short sighted users. The lens choices include black polarized, SOV  clear pc, ice laser pc, and yellow pc. I'm not an expert on outdoor sunglasses, but it looks like there are two sets of black lenses. The guide shows how you can switch out single piece and dual lenses. This is a nice set of sport style sunglasses, but they were too uncomfortable for me to wear for any length of time due to the rigid rubber nose piece. I have a flatter nose and this would fit someone with a sharper nose. I wear rubberized, darker colored sunglasses. These are designed for the active outdoors type. Please note that I received a free pair in exchange for an honest review.
summary: Great Set of Outdoor Sport Sunglasses, Not for Commuters

reviewText:
As far as I tell, this belt has a very good quality and it is professionally made and designed. First, it is reversible between two nice colors (black and dark brown), that are very appropriate for formal attires. Second, it is really soft and flexible and has a nice texture. Third, the buckle is impressive; you do not need to open it in order to reverse the belt. You just need to rotate the outer part of the buckle around itself. Finally, the sizing of this belt is accurate. I have ordered a size that is 2 inches more than my pants size, which is the standard rule for determining the belt size. The belt fits very well. Here is my complete feedback for this belt.

Feedback
-------------
 Length and Fit. The waist size of my pants is 38 inches and according to the general rule, I ordered the size 40 of this belt. It fits me very well and I still have empty holes at each side so I can have it tighter or relaxed without the need for extra holes.
Look and design. I like the two colors of this belt (black and brown) since they are suitable for formal attire, which I normally wear. The belt has a nice texture on both sides. Reversing the buckle cannot be simper, no special tools are needed. You just need to rotate the buckle around itself.
IMPORTANT: you need to pull the outer part of the buckle outside first then rotate. It will not rotate without pulling it out.
 Quality. The leather looks well-made and it is soft and comfortable. The two layers are stitched on the sides, which is thoughtful. In some reversible belts, the two layers are just glued together, which may be sufficient if they are professionally made, but having the stitch definitely make the belt durable. My previous stitched belt survived for almost 5 years.

Summary
-------------
Overall, I am happy with this belt. It fits very well and it has a very good quality as far as I can tell. It would be nice if the punched holes are enforced with some kind of metal or rigid material so that they will not deform or stretch out overtime.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for testing and review.
summary: High quality leather, nice texture, and fits as expected

reviewText: When first receiving this product, it seemed as if I was getting a gift!  The belt is attractively packaged and would be fully ready to go as a gift.  An initial thought on the belt was that is was so light and soft.  It made me question its strength and ability.  My husband absolutely loves it.  He goes through a new belt every few months, and so far in the past two weeks, there is no sign of wear.  The belts we buy at chain stores with name brands, are thick and sturdy.  That also means, that it shows wear pretty quickly wear the loops are used and bent each time to put it on.  There is no sign of color wear either because there aren't indentations where it has been used. This is a reversible black/brown in attractive shades.  I know that sounds odd, but sometimes the brown isn't really a true brown.  It is real leather and there is a reversible pin buckle to allow it to reverse.  You can cut it down to a smaller size if needed, so it may help to buy a larger size.  My husband absolutely loves this belt.  It is a bonus to find it be light, easy to pack for trips, and reversible in a real leather.  I received this product at a discounted price for my honest and unbiased review.  I would recommend this belt without hesitation!
summary: Light, sturdy belt is a  CLEAR WINNER!

I bought 2 of these, in different sizes and colors for my 2 sons. A word about sizing, since some of the other reviews had me confused. It fits true to size, but you need to remember that the top is SUPPOSED to be snug-fitting like a thermal top. If your child has a huskier build, then you may want to go up a size, but in that case then the pants might be too long.

If your child is between sizes or you're debating between two sizes then I recommend going for the larger size just to be safe, but I wouldn't go purposely a size up purely to compensate for what people are saying. I did that and now my older has to wear the PJ's I had intended for my younger son!

I'd sum it up by saying this style suits average or slender builds. My sons are tall and slender and this fits just great. If my child was husky though I would probably go with a totally different style of PJ since then the top would be too snug or the pants too long, depending on what size you go for.

One other item of note: the elastic waist is not too tight or too loose on my sons, an important factor for comfort. The style and feel of these PJ's was very popular with my son. These are great PJ's for pajama parties or pajama day at school - comfy, trendy original designs that don't look exactly like what every other kid has already.
summary: Great PJ's, good for average or slender builds.

reviewText: I ordered a size 3T for my very thin almost 3 year old son.  He loves these (specifically asks to wear them over other pajamas) and so do I.  The important thing to remember is that the top fits like most other Leveret NON-flame-resistant pajamas--it is meant to fit snugly.  However, although the top is not flame resistant, the bottoms ARE flame resistant and thus fit more loosely.  So the top is snug while the fleece bottoms are baggier.  These pajamas are super cute and comfortable; it is just important to purchase them with the way that they will fit in mind.

The pants are quite warm--so much so that I had to take them off of her while she was sleeping, because her little body was burning up.  It washed incredibly well (no shrinkage, nor color fading/pilling).  I swear by this brand for its quality/longevity, adorable designs, and stretchy, breathable fabric.

Just keep in mind that US size Large = Asian size XXXXL. I purchased according to my measurements and the item fit me perfectly. When buying from China remember to only go by measurements and you won't have a problem with the fit.
summary: This is a perfect fit if bought by measurements not size.

reviewText:
I bought this belt because I was taking over a new restaurant at work and would be needing to tuck in my uniform shirt. While it was too big for me originally, the company provided a leather punch in the box where you can make your own holes in the belt. It is awesome that they did that! Needless to say, because they did this, it fits AWESOME! And looks amazing.

I received this item for a discounted price, in exchange for a fair and honest review.

Although it says business leather belt, my husband wears it almost with every occasion or every pants or cargo shorts he puts on. The finish is so class and sophisticated it levels up every outfit that he wears. I'm so glad it came with the metal thing that punches hole. I got him a slightly bigger size and he needed another hole. It's  not the easiest thing to punch since it's  leather but certainly made the job clean. The quality is comparable to the expensive ones that he owns. It came in a nice box so if you are planning to give it as a gift it will be perfect. I purchased this for a lower price for evaluation so I can provide an honest and equitable review in return.
summary: I'm so glad it came with the metal thing that punches hole

reviewText: Buyer beware.  I bought a number of these masks for a stage production.  The edges of this mask around the eye holes and nose are sharp and will put pressure on your face, leaving red marks.  I avoided that problem by using a hot glue gun to glue parts of regular dish sponges (which I cut up) in the temples, between the eyes and on the jaw line.  So, these masks were usable and effective, but I had to do some work with them to make them comfortably wearable.

I wanted this for a, done at the mall, cartilage piercing. I don't know what gage they pierce with, or what gage the barbell I usually put in there is. This piercing is close to my skull, so I look for a ball backing, so I don't impale my head while I sleep, wear headbands, etc.

This fit my piercing great, although it was a little tight. The ball backing works well. It came off once, but I believe that was a fluke. The black part was longer than I thought, so it sticks out more than I wanted, but still looks good!!

The earings are very pretty however I had a allergic reaction to them, I was assured that the stud itself was Surgical steel But the actual top part is not...........So for me these do not work as I would need the entire earring to be surgical steel. The company contacted me and explained the top was not surgical steel  asked me what issues I had and asked If I would like a refund, I responded and explained my allergic reaction and said a refund would be nice.
They Did refund me.
All in all the earings are very pretty and would have loved to be able to wear them
summary: The earings are very pretty however I had a allergic reaction to them

reviewText: Loved my earrings.

All in all, this is a good pair of studs. The quality of nice, and they're not uncomfortable to wear. The post is a little short for my helix piercing, but they fit snugly which I like. My only problem with them is the size of the ball and stone/setting, which are both a little on the larger side. The setting prevents the stone from lying as flush with my ear as I would have liked, and has a tendency to get stuck in the colors of shirts when dressing. I changed the ball out for a smaller one for the same reason. Aside from how much the stone and setting sticks out from the surface of my ear, this earring has a very clean yet sophisticated look to it, and would look very nice as an earring worn in an ear lobe rather than in a cartilage piercing despite it being marketed as a cartilage earring.
summary: Clean look, but a little big. Would recomend for earlobe rather than cartilage.

reviewText:
I had images, and they are lost.  But, I'll do my best.  I gave this to my mom today for a Mother's day gift and she loved it. I gave it 4 stars because it came with random crystals, just as shown, I thought it would give you an option at some point, but it didn't.  Luckily, I sell rhinestones and things so I had my children's birthstones to replace the other random stones with.

This arrives in a great gift packaging and has a great mom/grandma saying that my mom just loved.  It's also a standard size, so change out the components to be whatever you'd like.  This is very similar to a popular jewelry line design.  And, various backgrounds and charms are available all over, which is cool, interchangeable.  I loved it for the gift.

The charms were cute and the packaging was perfect for a mom gift for sure.  The pendant was sturdy, made of steel and closed via magnets. It was very nice quality and had a great feel to it.  The necklace was a big hit at a gift.  I received this product at a discount or for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.  I did open the package and did replace the rhinestones with the proper ones.  And, I wish I could find the photos of it, it looks just like the image, however, mine had my own rhinestones in it.  The hinge is nice and sturdy and opening wasn't impossible, but wasn't overly easy so you won't lose the charms.
summary: Makes a great mom gift neckalce

reviewText: Don't waste your money. This was disappointment at its finest.

I just received my order today, just in time for Mother's Day and I'm slightly disappointed in my purchase. I wanted the gold heart on my necklace to say Mom, as it is pictured.. Mine says Grandma. Granted, she is now one, being a Mother's Day gift, I really wanted the Mom charm.. My card was also ripped and the necklace was not in place, so now I have to go through the trouble of putting it in something else and giving her something I'm not 100% satisfied with, and purchasing a new card. I'm still rating this a 4 though because the necklace being the main piece is nicely made.. Just not worth the $50 as a gift packaging and incorrect charms.
summary: just in time for Mother's Day and I'm slightly disappointed in my purchase

reviewText: What a perfect Mother's Day gift for the grandma! This necklace comes with a cute card that can be used to write in, and it is so well package that it is ready to gift as soon as receiving it. This necklace has a 22 inch long chain and the lock itself measures 30 millimeters which is perfect length for my mom to wear. These floating charms stay inside of the locket and the lock it is easy to open and has a magnet on one side that closes with a magnetic seal. Each  locket comes with the gems already in it and the other decorative items that are shown in the picture but you could absolutely change them out if you wanted to put something else in it. I like the colors of the jewels that come with it, but I might look for the birthstone gems of each of her grandchildren. It would be fun to add birthstone gems of each of her kids as well. The locket itself is stainless steel and it has a roller ball chain that I think will last a long time. The best thing about having you as my mom is my kids having you as a grandma, is the coolest saying that I have seen for a Mother's Day gift! And this necklace and the card both have that saying on it. This is definitely a fashionable necklace that you could spend lots and lots and lots for elsewhere, but it is a perfect quality and perfect gift purchase right here on Amazon. I did get a discount on this item in exchange for my honest and unbiased review which I have provided for you here today. Thank you for taking the time out of your shopping to read my review in its entirety. Have a blessed day.
summary: Grandma is going to love this for Mother's Day!

I love the pattern and deep colors. The ties at the legs can be adjusted and tied higher or tied lower into almost boy shorts. ***Disclaimer***
I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest opinions. All opinions are mine I just receive a slight discount on items I would buy anyway, in exchange I write a honest review. I receive the discount at time of purchase so the company does not influence any opinions, it is the same whether I rate it a 1 or a 5

Last year we looked for retro bathing suits before a trip to Florida. We found a lady who made them online, but the price was around $75 for each swimsuit I gave up on the idea that I would get the look I wanted at an affordable price, that is, until I found this swimsuit on Amazon. First, let me say, I love the quality and the stretchy material. I feel that it hides those flaws that I don't want showing when at the beach or pool. I felt that the sizing was described perfectly and the swimsuit came in at the size I anticipated.

I love the color. The suit is very well made. The breast pads are thick and full bra like cup is sewn in to give that busty look. The front of the suit is fully lined as well. The stitching appears to be reinforced and looks like it will be strong and sturdy and withstand years of use.
The suit itself is labeld as being made in China and shipped to the US, which gives me great confidence in the seller of the product for nailing sizing specifications. I have found in the past when purchasing clothing made in China, the sizing is usually off so KUDOS to the seller for getting that straightened out.

Though the label isn't 100% in English, it appears the suit is 82% polyester and 18% spandex. It states "Elasthan" as the spandex material, so perhaps this is some other type of material I am not familiar with.

The straps seem to be very well attached to the suit, which is really important in the quality of the suit. Some of the suits I have purchased from quality retailers and mass merchandisers have left a lot to be desired when it comes to strap,so I found the straps attachment to be firmly secured and well made.

Overall I think the suit is a great deal for the look I wanted!

I received this suit at a discount in exchange for an unbiased review of the product.
summary: Great Swimsuit at an affordable price!

reviewText:
I got this bathing suit because I absolutely LOVE the print.. The photo in the description does not do it any justice.  This print is just TO DIE FOR!

The reason for the three stars? THE FIT! I wear XL in everything else, except for this... It has a tie in the back to make the chest area tighter/loose if you wanted to and not quite sure what the ties on the side do.  The leg openings on this suit do not allow for much stretch, which is part of the reason I could not even try this on. I was afraid I was going to bust a seam.

The stitching is PERFECT on this suit - and the cups are BUILT IN so you don't have to worry about them getting soggy from being in the water and sliding around or folding over on themselves. It also has underwire to really supports the girls - which would be amazing if I could try it on to give you a full and honest review.

There is NO smell on this bathing suit and it ships QUICK so that is AMAZING - it has a panty liner on it so you can try it on and not be concerned someone else wore this!

I just wish the sizing was much better on this so I could actually try out the suit. I am going to have my friend try it on who is a 4-6 to see if that is the correct size for this suit.

reviewText:
I have large breasts and it is so hard to find bathing suits that will fit both top and bottom, especially as a one piece. This swim suit is perfect!

I love that this suit has a supported cup. It is almost like wearing a bra under the bathing suit, and I personally love it. It looks so nice and makes my breast look amazing. The perks of a one piece bathing suit are that it sucks your stomach in, making you look much thinner. Pair that with the great cups on the top, and you have an awesome bathing suit. It has wider leg openings so it covers your butt completely, but even so, I still like to wear little shorts, like yoga shorts, on top of it. I just don't like to show my private area.

This suit is made of standard bathing suit material. It feels like lined nylon, maybe? It is nice and stretchy, and the bright red coloring looks great. It has been washed five or so times and is still as brightly colored as the day I opened it up. I love that it makes me feel skinnier, because after my last baby, I wasn't feeling to sexy. I found this bathing suit and fell in love with the style. The neckline is unique and it fits amazingly well. I love this and it seems really well made and durable, so I hope to have it for a long time. We are going to the Rapids water park over the summer and will be wearing this for a full day of water rides and swimming, so I guess we'll see how well this really holds up. I will update my review after that trip and let you know how it holds up.

I got this bathing suit at a discount, in exchange for my honest review.

I was extremely disappointed with this swimsuit. I measured and ordered according to the sizing on the product description page and the bust was still WAY too small. I wear a 36F but measured in inches across the top of my bust and the sizing guide said 3XL. My boobs could not get any wear near to being covered with the  size top I received! Addionally the bottom was too loose!

The material of the swimsuit was extremely cheap, the center front seam was NOT at all centered. The underwire was poking through the mesh material. Worst of all the front looked TERRIBLE due to loose white threads all the bust area! Yes loose WHITE threads, not red, they must have been sewn through from the backing or something!

I am returning this swimsuit as soon as possible, it not only does not fit as described, it is made of cheap flimsy material. I would try recommend this swimsuit to anyone honestly. Not because of the sizing but because is just badly made.
* I did receive this swimsuit at a discounted price in exchange for my honest opinion and unbiased review. I don't enjoy leaving one star reviews but this swimsuit was seriously just awful...
summary: Covered in loose threads and way too small

It's tired on with a ribbon rather than the plastic push through tag so there's no snags, and is easy to undo to hop into it!

The white is white, the colors are vibrant, and the pattern is perfect. The material is nice enough, not the softest I've had, but certainly not cheap or scratchy feeling. The molded top for cupping the breast is spot on and will make your boobs look like a milking bucks as long as you have enough to fill them.  I would say a B cup should do it.  Smaller and the molded cup may gap away from your breast. Awkward!

There are a few accent ties, two on the sides, one on each hip, and one criss-cross on the back. They are all functional and can be adjusted.

My only complaint is I had to stretch it to get it to fit right, and I'm a very short waisted girl. If I had to pull to get the length to a good spot, I can't imagine a gorgeous long waisted person trying to squeeze into this! And I'm not thick, so it's not like the extra give went to circumference. They are just short in waist length.

But I still love it overall and I'm stinkin thrilled to have it. I was given this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

This bathsuit is super cute. The print is adorable. I ordered the white cherries. The green leaves are a brighter almost lime green color. The fit for me was almost perfect. reviewText:
This coat runs true to size IF you are have an Aisian body type.
However, my family is of Slavic/Germanic descent, so, knowing nothing that comes from China fits us, I ordered the coat 2 sizes larger that I would buy in America. I ordered the coat for my 10 year old grandaughter who weighs about 120 pounds and is about 5 foot 1 inch tall and wears a women's MEDIUM. I bought an EXTRA LARGE.  All that that being said, it fits her PERFECTLY wearing winter clothes under it.
The coat is very soft inside and out, VERY WARM and nicely made.  The COAT IS NOT WATERPROOF.  The outside feels almost like a micro fiber blanket; the inside lining of the body of the coat is kind of a cross between a blanket and fake fur. It does not shed on clothes though.  The insides of the sleeves are lined with a cotton material.  Down fill is sandwiched in between all
The coat has a full length zipper as well as snaps over the zipper and also has an enclosed tie that runs around the middle so the waist can be snugged up if necessary.
The hood is generous and lined with the same blanket/fur material as the body of the coat. The fake fur around the hood is not especially soft, but it is not awful either and does not seem to be shedding; I think it looks very cute.
The coat comes almost to my grandaughter's knees, which is very good in my opinion as it keeps much more of her body warm.  But as I said, she is only about 5' 1", so if you are taller, the coat will be shorter as it is in the advertisement picture.
I ordered it in pink but it is slightly on the salmon side.  I find that much prettier than the baby pink shown in the picture.
I had been looking at several coats and vascillating over the size I wanted.  I accidentally ordered a large when I really had meant to order an XL (knowing it came from China).  I contacted the company by email before it shipped and asked if they could send the XL instead of the L.  The company responded by email within 30 minutes and immediately pulled the large and replaced with the XL and shipped it out the same day. They were very nice about it.
I paid $39.99 for it with free shipping. It had gone up to $41.99 by the time I received it, and now I see the price has gone up to $44.99.  I feel it was worth the $39.99 I paid for it.  I certainly would NOT pay more than $45.00 for this coat (and only if the shipping remains free)
I ordered it on November 11, 2015 and received it on November 27, 2015, so 16 days from China; not too bad.
My Grandaughter is HARD on her clothes so she managed to rip the right pocket about 4 inches because she forever has her hands in it and tugs.  I reparied it easily with a couple of hand stitches and I reinforced the left pocket at the corner against future issues.  (Normal people probably would NOT have to take this step!)
She has had it 3 weeks now and has worn it to school every day.  I am just about to give it it's first wash and will re-review if the coat has issues.  The washing instructions are to "HAND WASH"  I will try to upload a picture of her wearing it.
So far,  I REALLY like this coat and I will buy another when the price comes back down.
6/27/2016
I meant to update this sooner.  Granddaughter got this filthy on the playground - more than once..  I sprayed all the extra dirty parts with pre wash (I use a mixture of 1 bottle of hydrogen peroxide and about 2 teaspoons of dawn dish soap in a spray bottle for all my pre wash...works great).
Anyway, sprayed it. Let it set a couple of hours to overnight. Put it in the washing machine on warm and casual cycle/long wash, double rinsed it, hung it up on a sturdy hanger and hung it outside to dry.  When dry, I brushed the fur around the hood with a hairbrush to fluff it up again.  Boom, done.  Came out great.  I have since washed it at least 8 times.  Still fine.
WARNING>  THE MANUFACTURER RECOMMENDS HAND WASH.  (But I still don't; I have no time or back for that).

reviewText:
I will say that I absolutely love this handbag by Yahoho. It definitely looks much better in person. You can tell that this purse is made from real leather. The brown leather is textured and super soft. The purse has some adorable gold hardware which make this purse unique.

The overall size of this purse is approximately 16 L x 10 H X 5 W. The base of the purse is almost 13.5 inches but I based the length on the widest part. The sides of the purse is kind of scrunched together with a buckle so the bottom extends out a little more. The top of the buckle has a gold d-ring where the included strap can be attached. Theres an adjustable strap that you can use with this purse to turn it into a shoulder bag. The strap adjusts by a gold buckle and the strap has 5 holes.

I actually prefer just using the handles. There are two padded handles that are attached by gold metal links. I really love the unique design of the gold metal swivels where the handles attach to the purse. It pinches the leather together and gives it a more dimensional appearance. The swivels allow the handles to drop properly in place.

The top of the purse features a gold zipper with a large gold pull. Inside the purse is chocolate brown. The lining has a water repellent material so its really easy to wipe clean. The backside has a 6.5 zipper pocket. In front of this zipper pocket is an 8.5 pouch with a zipper pocket. The other side has an 8 side pocket. Theres a 4 hard flat bottom. Theres plenty of room in this purse to fit almost anything that you need. You can even slide your tablet in along with your wallet and makeup bag. The side pouch is great for things like my calendar book and phone so I can quickly find it when needed.

The back of the purse features a 7 zipper pocket. It has a gold zipper with a large gold pull. It has the same lining as the inside of the purse. The pocket is about 4.5 tall. I like to use this pocket for shopping receipts or other personal notes.

I received a nice dust bag with my purse. This is great to help keep it clean when storing. I absolutely love this purse. The leather is very nice and the colors are gorgeous. This unique looking purse is perfect for me. I highly recommend this Yahoho leather purse. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Fashionable & Very Soft Leather Handbag with Lots of Storage Inside

reviewText:
I purchase items quite frequently from Amazon, and sometimes something won't work out for one reason or another. It happens! But never have I been so disappointed in a seller or their product that I have felt like giving them a ZERO. These are the reasons why I would not recommend them or their product.

It took nearly a month to get these bras. After waiting such a long time, you hope to get exactly what they describe on their page. Not even close!

1. These are advertised as Genie bras. I sincerely doubt that these are genuine Genie bras. There is absolutely nothing to identify these as being name brand Genie bras. They arrived in clear cellophane bags -- no box or package that says Genie. The inside writing on the bra does not say Genie. I have purchase several Genie bras, they all were stamped Genie inside the bra. These just have irregular stamping with size and fabric content. I think they are cheap knockoffs. You will notice in several of the reviews for this same seller with different colored bras (beige, etc.) reviewers remark that these bras were not the same quality, size, or colors of their previous Genie bras. Probably because they are not genuine Genie bras as advertised.
2. The colors were a far cry from what is shown and described on the page. The only color that even came close was the turquoise. The red turned out to be traffic-cone orange and the purple was not light purple but a dark, shiny purple. Not the colors I wanted.
3. You would think they could at least get the size right. No! I ordered medium and was sent small. Other reviewers have complained about the sizing, some saying they were too tight. What I got was loose fitting, so I can't imagine what they would have fit like if they had actually sent the mediums I ordered. My other Genie bras are all medium and fit great.
4. When I tried them on, the band just rolled up. The padding inside the cups was cut too large for the actual cup size, so the padding curled out on the bottom creating a giant ridge -- just what you want for a smooth look under clothing, padding curled and sticking straight out.
5. Even with all of this, I was open to trying to resolve it with the seller, I contacted them via e-mail (through Amazon) with a request for return. I never heard from them.

This is why I would give Amazon Customer Service FIVE stars! I didn't have to do anything or hassle with them. After a week went by (since my e-mail to seller), they automatically e-mailed me to find out if I had heard back from the seller. When I told them no, I was e-mailed easy instructions on how to file a claim to get a refund. They attempted to contact the seller again to try to resolve the issue to no avail. Amazon gave me a refund and I really appreciated it. They took the time to make sure that I as a customer was satisfied and they made good on a transaction with a poor seller even though it was not their fault. Thank you Amazon!
summary: 0 Stars for Seller/Product -- 5 Stars for Amazon Customer Service

reviewText: The vest is cute - the fabric isn't super high quality.  It's a fashion piece, not meant to really keep you warm. The problem I had was with the zippers!! They are so cheap and ROUGH.  Right when I got it I tried it on to see if it fit and the zipper snagged my cashmere sweater in 3 different places, just by trying it on.  Even the zippers on the pockets on the side would catch my sweater if my arms got too close to them.  If they could just use a smoother type of zipper it would make all the difference in the world.  I would buy one of these vests in each color if it wasn't for the awful zipper.  It's like a nail file, terrible.  If you wear a cheap tee shirt underneath or a woven cotton button down type of shirt, then I guess it would be too bad, but don't even think about wearing a sweater under this vest.  It will be totally ruined and snagged within hours.  Really bummed.

reviewText: These are so soft that our 9-month-old baby doesn't even know she has them on. She's teething and these bibs do a good job of keeping her shirt dry. They're just thick enough to absorb better than most bibs but not at all bulky. They reach to the low part of her chest and I put another bib over it when feeding her so she can continue to wear it all day. So much easier than changing her clothes two or three times a day. My other issue was with the fabric.  From the picture I thought the 2 layers were exactly the same.  The description also said that material was a mixture of linen and cotton.  The top layers is a kind of gauze fabric.  The bottom layer is a woven fabric.  There's probably some cotton in the mix, but linen, I highly doubt.

If you're looking for comfort, this is the dress.  It's somewhat lightweight, so should be comfortable on cooler summer days.
summary: Not as expected, but still nice.

reviewText: I ordered this very cool dress in a size 4.  I am tiny 32 breast, short just barely under 5'4. My weight is 112.  I did feel this fit in some ways almost perfect.  My issue is the shoulder area it was snug. I do have broad shoulders (for as small as I am) so this wasn't too shocking but- I did want a loose fit as described. The small does fit but not the way I want it too.  I actually ordered another in a size 6.  I normally wear a 2-4.  I am considered petite being under 5'5.  The dress in a size 4 came to about my bottom calf-top of ankle or high ankle. The 6 is only a couple inches larger and where the 4 was loose enough in breast and everywhere else it wasn't loose enough for my taste( or my shoulders)  I did not return the size 4.  I may keep it as it does fit or I might use it as a gift for my niece who is half my age but a size 2.  I am between a 2-4 depending on what the clothing is.  I could wear a 4, 6 or 8 in this dress--  It depends on your personal preference I would say.  The yellow color is an odd color it is not bright yellow like a cab but has a slight hue of very light olive in it, I would call it a yellow drab; not a yellow cab.  it is a cool color, I will admit -odd but cool.. The buttons are fake, you cannot undo them. They are for looks. fyi. The entire dress is double layered with the exception of the sleeves. They can be buttoned or rolled up. I hope my review helps someone. I spent hours trying on different sizes because I could since I ordered my mother one.  I am somewhere in the middle opinion-wise and say the size will be personal preference.  if you are tiny and have broad shoulders I recommend going up in size so that you have some extra stretch room  in the shoulders.. Great dress and very chic! I will likely order more.

I haven't washed it yet, and I didn't wash it before wearing, which I usually do. I only stuck it in the dryer for like 5 minutes on medium. It seemed fine. Happy about this dress.

Ive been branching out of my comfort zone and trying to wear clothes that are a little more risqu than what I typically wear..just because Im a mom doesnt mean I need to dress like one and this shirt is fantastic. Im personally excited to wear this come summer. I have to wear a suit jacket regardless of the weather and it can get so hot in the summer that this shirt is perfect. It looks perfectly nice and professional with my jacket on and no one will be any the wiser about the back of the shirt. This is a shirt thats really versatile and you can really dress it up or dress it down. It looks amazing paired with my professional suit and with a cute pair of jeans and boots. I ordered the size 14, which is my size, and its a little tightbut I also lean a little towards size 16 on tops because I have a larger bust. I would say its pretty true to size, but if you prefer your shirts looser, order a size up. The quality is fantastic and I would certainly purchase this shirt again. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest, unbiased opinion.

reviewText: I think this is Russian size 54 or 56.  Buy it two sizes bigger than usual.

I rarely write feedback or review but in this case much deserved. This company's customer service is 5 star. Customer service seems to becoming a dwindling priority but this company shines. The shirt is made from soft, durable cotton. Because it is cotton it does have minor shrinkage, but at its first wash the shirt becomes softer. The color hasn't faded as yet. The collar is almost like a modified boatneck design. In my opinion the construction of the shirt is well made. Because this shirt is foreign made, the sizes are different from the US. It tends to be at  one size smaller than you buy here. Plus, it is cotton and allow for some shrinkage. We washed ours in cold water, and put it in the dryer. You have to decide what you like in a fit. If you like the big, oversized look it would a good idea to go big size. For example, if you are in a mens large and you want it to fit as a large go for an XL. It will shrink to your desired look, but be conservative of your laundry habits at first. For my family, the bigger the better, so I ordered 3XL's. When in doubt go larger.  Shipping time is a bit long, that is because it is not shipped from the US. Well worth the wait. The only problem I have with these shirts is my family swipes them before I can get to one first.

reviewText:
If you are into the Panerai look, buy this watch! This is an excellent Panerai homage watch in quartz.

The elephant in the room is that this is a quartz homage watch rather than a mechanical homage watch but just let me say that I own both and I highly recommend this watch.

Just the facts:
This is a bit larger than the typical PAM, at 46mm, not counting the crown and the band is 26mm rather than the more typical 24mm.
I would agree with the other reviewer that this is not a real leather band but it does have a nice, spring bar pre-V buckle, so I would just go with it until it wears out and then buy one of the abundant leather 26mm bands out there.

This watch features the small seconds hand at 9, that almost all other watches in this price range miss and the date magnifier actually magnifies the date, which is aligned perfectly. The crown protector is the correct size and thickness and has the release towards the 12 o'clock, that most other watches in this price range seem to reverse.

The dial appears to be the two part pancake style but unfortunately the lume on the dial is absent, although there is some lume on the hands.

The back of the watch is press fitted rather than screwed on and the case appears to be chromed something (likely zinc) rather than stainless steel, also the band is held on with spring bars instead of screws.

All in all for the price, you can not go wrong with this watch!

Ordered 006, the entirely leather jacket, was looking forward to replacing my old one which broke. I even double checked in my order history, and indeed I had ordered 006.

However, I received 005, the leather jacket with CLOTH ARMS AND CLOTH BACK, with ostentatious zippers in the front side as well, which is completely different from what I wanted. Now I have to return it, and I'd like to send it in for a replacement rather than simply returning it, but then I'd risk simply getting sent the wrong order again.... so I will have to find a leather jacket somewhere else.

Based on some reviews, it seems like other people had this problem as well. For others looking at this jacket, be aware that they seem to mix up the black leather jacket orders somewhat often.

I'm going to try ordering 006 again, the entirely leather one. Will update after that goes through to see if I get the right one this time.

The material is light and airy, and has enough of a gentle cling in the bust and shoulder area to not make anyone look like they are wearing a tent. I am rather busty with wide shoulders and am fairly short, so I worried that this top would make me look like a circus tent and be too long, but it honestly was a perfect length. First and foremost, the fabric is really soft, stretchy, and flowy. For a skinny (aka small chested) woman, the dress may fit better. For women who are a bit curvier, this dress won't fit as well. It was tight on my breast (38DD) and waist, but baggy around the arm holes. That may look okay with a cardigan over it. Just make sure it's one of those short cardigans. The dress is fitted around the high waist but fluffy so it'll hide any "imperfections", so a long cardigan wouldn't look as well. I'm 5'10" and the dress came right to the top of my knees. I normally wear a size L, but I ordered an XXL. The dress fit well (a bit tight) everywhere except the arms. I've attached a pic. If this review helped you, please click "Yes" so that other women will see it as well.

UPDATE: After washing once...one leg faded  these are actually funny at this point...see last picture. These jammies are awful. I order one for each of my kids, four pairs total...each set was different in some way.

Appearance:
The pants are orange and green NOT red and green. Some of the pants are linen type cotton and other are super soft cotton. NONE of the shirts look the same. Some of the snowmen have a "situation" with their eyes. All of the color is off from one piece to the next...none of the bottoms match material or coloring as the tops. It looks like many different fabrics were used. The seems are crazy and lots of weirdo stitching.

Sizing:
The 3T is significantly larger than the 4T o_O Each shirt has a different label so the sizing is different and not reliable. If you MUST order these jammies I would go up 2 sizes and I promise these will shrink.

Ok...so these jams suck. I would only recommend them if you are (like me) in a time crunch a NEED something for your kid to wear to a Christmas jammy party. I accidently actually even ordered TWO of these sweaters, who needs two of them? Long story short the seller haggled with me back & forth arguing that it was inconvenient to return the items to them. I was incredibly frustrated with the whole process! I ended up agreeing to keep the product & get  a portion of my money refunded. I ended up donating the sweaters to Goodwill so someone will get to enjoy the sweaters which is the only positive I've had purchasing these. the material is nothing comparable to a typical cotton sweater I would have still enjoyed wearing the sweater with its fabric but it is very small. reviewText:
Positive: the tiger's eye pair of plugs in this set are my favorite. I love the weight of the stone.

Positive: All of these plugs have a groove in the back to make it harder for the O-rings to slide off. That is unusual with stone plugs, in my experience. The groove isn't deep by any means and the O-rings still slide off, but the fact that it's there at all makes me happy.

Negative: The jade is much darker than pictured. It's fine, but it's not as striking as the photo. They also seem like they're covered with something, like a wax or maybe dye? I washed them and they still feel strange, but nothing has come off on my hands, so it's a draw. I have several other pairs of jade plugs and none of them feel like these.

Negative-ish?: The howlite pair I received is totally white on the front, but speckled through with the black on the back of the plug. It's not a deal-breaker, but they look different from the photo.

I might buy these again if I lost them for some reason. I like the tiger's eye plugs enough that it makes up for my ambivalence about the others.

I like the white ones. They are the most accurate to the pictures. The green is bright in the pics but are so dark it's hard to tell they are green. The brownish ones in the pics are dark but they are more of a Carmel, hazel color IRL.

reviewText: Great fit, great feel and hooray for pockets!!!

To be perfectly honest, I wasn't expecting much from these jeggings because of the price. Not to mention, I had never worn jeggings before and had heard that they tended to crease around the crotch area or hang off of the buttocks as they stretched throughout the day. Fortunately, that was not the case with these. They're soft, comfortable, and flexible, all without falling down or hanging loose in areas where you want them to remain tight. They truly do look like jeans and unless someone were to walk up and touch them, they probably wouldn't know that it's not true denim.

I ordered the Navy Blue in XXL because I wanted something that actually looked like true denim. My regular size is 16/18 and these fit perfectly. I like to wear them with my black knee-high boots because there is no bunching up at the bottom, so my boots slide right over them with ease.

I wash my jeggings on the regular cycle and dry them on high. I didn't realize until the third wash that you're supposed to handwash them and tumble dry. Oops! Fortunately, I haven't noticed any shrinkage, damage, or color-fading. They're still in great shape with the same dark blue color.

Because these are so versatile and comfortable, you can wear it with almost anything at any time. I highly recommend them.

* I received this product at no cost in exchange for an unbiased review. All opinions are my own.
summary: Comfortable, Denim-Like, and Versatile - LOVE THEM

Boy I don't know where the translation between the picture and the actual garment got lost but what I got is not what is pictured. Other than the color, what I got is not what I ordered! I understand that Asian sizes are smaller than American sizes, I have purchased clothing from other sellers on amazon before. I wear a small in US clothes so I order xl or 2xl depending on recommendations from the seller or other Amazon customers. Like I said I can get an xl or 2xl and be great. With this "jacket", I ordered an xl thinking that if it's a tiny bit snug, it would be fine. Now this "xl" is a kids and I mean like size 4 to 7 "xl". I can put it on and it's  a "fat man in a little coat" situation! I feel like I'm wearing my 8 year old son son's shirt! The picture is of a cool military jacket, cut longer in the front than in the back. What I received is just barely cut that way. It has 14 buttons, EVERY SINGLE BUTTON HAS THREAD HANGING OUT!!! Literally all of them, where was quality control that day!? To top it off, it does not close and not because of how it fits me but because it physically has no way of closing! The buttons are all loosely sown on for decoration. In the pictures the girl is wearing  it open and apparently that is the only option! Oh and you  can see through it, it's so darn thin! reviewText: Too small , I think I even order  a large or x large

Well, I've put it off as long as I can. I really hate leaving really bad reviews. You kind of get the impression you're buying an item that is hand made, not mass produced in China. It comes sort of attached to a card that says made in China on it. The quality is appalling. It arrived broken. The rose on the ring had come off. I don;t know where they get their measurements for a wrist, but it's clearly not from a human adult. The part that goes on your wrist couldn't possibly be expected to fit an average persons wrist. What you can't see in the picture is the extender chain. Yes, a lot of bracelets have them. But, usually you don't really need them. Maybe an extremely anorexic person could wear this without using the extender.  The glue used to hold the rose and other decorative parts is obviously very cheap if it can't even last long enough to make it to the buyer. The entire item is so poorly made and obviously slapped together on an assembly line. Not handmade. The chains are not metal, as they appear in the photo. Most of it is cheap plastic and the clasp is uneven. To be honest I have purchased much nicer items at The Dollar Store. I showed it to my neighbor and she said she could make a better one. Looking at some other reviews I see this is a problem for others as well.

I did contact the seller. They responded promptly and offered to send me another one and even provided a link to the item. However, it was not for the in the picture. It was for a white one with a completely different design. This says to me the seller may not have even taken the time to look up my order and see which one I had purchased. I'm very disappointed.
summary: Not handmade, mass produced in China.

It does seem to run a little small. I ordered the large too just to see the size difference, I'll probably update once it comes in.  I'm 5'2, 112, larger through the chest, and the S fits ok just a little snug around the arms/shoulders.  The length hits right at the top of my hips, which is perfect.  The back is quite low; I can wear a regular bra, but it takes some wiggling and maybe some fabric tape.  It seems well made enough for the price; it's not a high end piece, but it's not a high end price, either.  It's a really flattering little shirt, and a nice balance of sexy and covered up; this wouldn't work with a too-low neckline.  The edges are raw and the button that holds the back together isn't exactly solidly attached (nothing a few stitches can't fix), but again, at this price point, that's to be expected.  The arms are cut slim, and the back does flip open quite a bit.  I plan on wearing a very minimal black bra underneath and think it'll be fine, but if you're comfortable braless, that's probably the way to go.

Edit to update: I bought the large as well, and it fit MUCH better than the small.  I didn't see a huge size difference between the two, honestly, the large just gave me enough room to move without feeling like I was going to hulk out of the shirt.  I think the medium would've been perfect, as the large was maybe a wee touch loose, but the medium wasn't Prime at the time and I needed it quickly.  I returned the small, kept the large, and wore it out this weekend to rave reviews.

So for $12, it's not a bad value. This is a cute sheer top made for a tween. I normally wear a medium to large for fitted items. Medium for loose. This is loose fitting and I got the XL based on their size chart, doesn't come close to fitting plus it took a month to arrive and now I must await a return approval. This is a great top for young girls, my 14 year old niece would fit this XL perfectly and she's 100 pounds soaked and wet. I'll let you know how the return goers. Not a lot of room to gripe about $11.99 but what a waste of time and carbon foot print.
summary: Reminder to self - read the reviews before buying.

reviewText: Buyer beware. Major design flaw in this item.  The neck opening is not big enough to fit over my head & there is no clasp or stretch to speak of. In the XXL it is 19 inch opening. My head is 21.  I showed it to a tailor who said to send it back, he wouldn't even touch it.  I am a little handy with a sewing machine and was able to fix it myself by cutting the back of the neck and creating a lined placket with a hook and eye closure.  but I spent far more time on it than I would have expected.  Would not purchase this item again.  Very cute but the sizing runs way too small.

This Melondipity hat is adorable. A friend is having a baby soon, and I purchased this hat as part of my baby shower gift.

I did open the packaging, as I am planning to use it as the top of a diaper cake.  It is so soft and a bit stretchy, so you won't have to worry about it squishing your new little one's noggin.  The hat also arrived very quickly, so I was able to order it and put it on top of the diaper cake just two days later.  The quality for the price cannot be beat!

The hat is a lovely pink color with subtle purple stripes running through the hat and the bow on the front. The hat and attached bow are made well and do not seem like they will wear at all with use. It also came very well packaged.

Overall if I ever had the need I would definitely purchase again.  It is such a perfect gift for a new mommy to be to be able to have at the hospital and keep for their little one to see how small they once were!

I have received this product for free or at a discounted price in exchange for my unbiased feedback. I do not know or have any relations to the seller. I have not been told what type of feedback to provide. I have simply found a product I wanted, ordered it at a discounted price, and agreed to review the product, good or bad, here on Amazon.
summary: So cute, perfect for a baby shower gift!

reviewText: It was alright, but it didn't fit.

I needed to buy my tall and very thin teenage son his first adult sized suit. I looked at separates, but I couldn't get items that matched well enough (color and material wise) to appeal to me, so based on the reviews, I took a chance on buying this 3-piece suit online (thinking I would just mail it back if it didn't fit). It does fit! He wears a size 36R jacket and this one fits almost perfectly. The shoulders even leave just a little room for growth. The ONLY downside to this suit is that my son has really long arms, and the sleeves fit him so well now that they will probably end up being too short fairly soon. There are no store bought pants that I can find that will fit my son, as by the time the waist fits him, they end up being way too short. These pants however are size a 29 waist and are really long with no bottom hem, so they are the closest I have been able to come in the waist and Ill have them hemmed to the perfect length. These pants look nice and should fit him for quite some time. The vest fits as well and looks so much better than the ones I had him try on at local stores. Im not a fashion expert, so I won't speak in detail about the quality of the material or the cut of the suit, but it seems like nice material to me and my son and I both love how it looks on him. So if you are tall and thin, I would highly recommend trying this suit!
summary: Fantastic suit for tall thin teenagers!

Other than that I'm happy with it. Kind of wish the zipper was on the front because it makes going to the bathroom a bit of an ordeal especially by yourself (I had to do this at a music festival), but that's really not a huge deal. Also this does have built in gloves so you won't be eating buffalo wings in this costume. The eyeholes for the mask are quite difficult to see out of, so be wary of that.

This is JUST a costume though. If you wear this and only this you will look kind of lame, and some people may not even get who you are supposed to be. To complete this costume you need 4 more things in my opinion. A set of swords for your back, a utility belt with a gun holster or an additional thigh holster, a fake gun for said holster (preferably a metal airsoft gun), and a deadpool belt buckle for the utility belt. Add all those accessories and you will have a hard costume to beat.
