This hoodie just arrived today...all the way from China. Based on the size chart, I got a medium and it fits a little baggy. I was inbetween sizes so I had a good feeling this would be baggy.

A couple issues I have with it:
-  the fabric is very thin. So thin if you hold it up you can see light shining through the fabric. Overall though, the outer fabric feels smooth and the inner fabric is soft... Just as you would expect from an old school hoodie.
- I wish the sleeves were a little longer
- I wish the length was a little longer. It's not too short but an inch or two longer would have been nice.
- the hood is tiny...like it only covers half my head! And my head is not unusually large

All in all, I like the look of the hoodie and will wear it on not so cold days when I need a long sleeve layer thicker than a third but thinner than my fleece. It's a nice step up from the plain Hanes hoodies from when I was younger.

I did receive this hoodie at a discounted rate in exchange for an honest review. Would I buy it again... Not sure. I would probably opt to spend a little more and get a fleece.

reviewText:
This dress is gorgeous. I ordered this to wear to my husbands company Christmas party. It looks much better than expected. This dress has two layers. I believe the lining is polyester and may have a small mix of spandex because it is very stretchy. The outer layer is chiffon and has some lace. This dress is very comfortable yet sexy also.

Measurements for XL

Chest: 19 wide

Waist: 16.5 wide

Sleeve Length: 23 long (from shoulder seam)

Length: 56 long (from shoulder to bottom hem)

The front of the dress has a low cut cross-over V-neck. The chest area has some ruching. The shoulders and arms have a gorgeous lace design. Im pleasantly surprised that the lace sleeves are not tight at all. I can easily move around and be comfortable. It has a small amount of stretch to it. The bottom of the sleeves have a unique look with a scalloped edge and some fraying.

Under the chest area is more decorative lace that goes all the way around the dress. The lace is approximately 1.5 wide. There is about a 27 slit up the right leg. Its a straight cut and not opened. In other words the dress still closes and does not have an open gap. Theres some ruching under the lace band which gives the bottom of the dress a great amount of flow. This also helps to keep the slit closed more because theres more fabric. Im not one to show my legs but I do feel comfortable with the way this dress is made.

The back is very sexy yet still conservative. The upper portion of the back is the same lace that continues from the shoulders and arms. Underneath this lace is more chiffon with ruching. The back closes by a single gold button that is attached to the back of the lace. This gold button fits into a loop to close. This can be difficult to undo sometimes but I eventually get it done. Underneath is like a thin oval opening back. Below this is an 11 invisible zipper.

The bottom of the dress have a very tiny hem and the stitching is superb. The length of this dress is perfect on me. I can wear flat or heels. This dress looks amazing dressed up with some nice jewelry. I wore this to a small event recently and cant wait to dress it up more for my husbands company Christmas party in a few weeks. I received lots of compliments and it was really comfortable to wear for the several hours that I had it on. I love all the beautiful details and how sexy yet classy it looks. I am very happy with this dress and I would recommend it for any special occasion. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Sexy yet Classy Chiffon and Lace Dress for Special Occasions

reviewText:
This was purchased as a Christmas gift, it took quite a long time to find just the right bracelet that I was looking for, and it had received good reviews.  When I received the package, before even opening it, I could hear the rattle of beads.  I opened the envelope to find a very pretty box with a bow, but when I opened the box I found the whole bracelet was in pieces, the string was just laying in the box with all the beads/stones just loose in the box, it was almost like a little kit that you would put together yourself.  I was so very disappointed because it is a very nice looking bracelet.  I do not know how it even came apart completely, either bad workmanship, or shipping issue.

*I was contacted by customer service at Amorstore, regarding the damaged bracelet I received.  They looked into the problem and found that when made, the string was to tight which resulted in making the bracelet snap.  They have kindly sent me a replacement, and when I received the bracelet, it was in a nice box, and was perfectly made.  It is a beautiful bracelet, and I appreciated all the help and concern I received from Amorstore customer service.
summary: and it had received good reviews. When I received the package

I decided it was time to invest in some men's jewelry.  At first I was a little uncertain, since I have never worn bracelets, and after much consideration I chose the  Matte Agate Men's Bracelet and am so glad I did.  I waited a little while to write my review, having read other reviews for different sellers and bracelets that stretched out over time or broke, but after wearing this bracelet for 6 weeks it is just like new, so the quality is great.

Regarding the appearance, it is perfect.  The black is matte and masculine, while also being smooth and soft on the wrist.  The, single, white bead is shiny and has a little bit of color/texture running through it.  It is both masculine and gentle and reminds me of the Yin Yang when I wear it.

I highly recommend this bracelet.
summary: and after much consideration I chose the Matte Agate Men's Bracelet and am so glad I did

This Bohemia Collection Beads Multilayer Bracelet by Dor Designs is stylish and a great accessory for all occasions. I received a bracelet for testing purposes and this is my honest and unbiased review.

I really like the Boho style of this bracelet. I chose the Midnight Black design but there are 5 other color schemes that could probably go with any of outfit you own. These bracelets can be worn dressed up or dressed down, paired with other bracelets or just worn individually. I really like how attractive the color schemes are.

The bracelet, for the most part, is made of plastic and is extremely light weight. It really doesnt weigh down your wrist, but I was hoping the materials used would be more hardy and durable. The whole bracelet is stretchy and elastic and can fit almost any size wrist. They are easy to slip on and off and don't really get in the way. There are a total of seven varying layers that makes up the whole Bohemian style bracelet. The main layer, the beads layer can also be worn alone.

These are inexpensive bracelets that make great stocking stuffers or bracelets. They look great for the price and look a lot more expensive than they are. Great style!
summary: Stylish and Attractive Bohemian Style 7-Layer Bracelet

reviewText: Great quality. It was perfect.

This canvas backpack/duffel bag is ideal for school and weekend trips. I got this bag to hold my laptop and clothes for a small day pack for a two week long trip, and it fulfilled it's purpose. This bag holds an 8" width x 12" length x 14" diagonal laptop easily with lots of room. It can also hold a 10" w x 15" l x 18" d laptop extremely snugly but bordering on uncomfortably.
Pros:
Bag is incognito while traveling.
The bag can hold 2 outfits (read: 2 NEATLY PACKED outfits,) snacks, toiletries, and a 14" d laptop fit in the main compartment comfortably at the same time. A cell phone charger, small/medium smart phone, and wallet can fit in the zippered pocket.
This is a structurally sound bag. This bag survived an international flight (from Germany to Toronto, Canada) holding 3 two liter bottles. The bag was taut around the bottles but shows no signs of stress after the trip ended.
Cons:
The "D loop strap" attached to the zipper at the top of the bag intended for one of the contact points for the attachable duffel strap is partially disintegrated (1/4th of the webbing is ripped,) after wear and tear for several weeks.
The padding is barely sufficient for a laptop.
The zipper to the main compartment seems like it will eventually come apart or even break if the bag is not zipped fully while carrying weight.
The buckles holding the straps are troublesome to fasten/unfasten and catch easily on things around the bag.

Disclosure Statement: This product was provided to me for free/discounted in exchange for my honest review

Day 2 and one of the buckles that holds the duffel bag tore and that does it for me.
Great features, probably zero tolerance to normal use?
There are other options out there.

I am a big fan of form that follows function. This bag excels is this regard. It is a backpack, a shoulder bag, and a duffel.

On the outside you have two grab handles, one on the side and one on the end. You can carry it vertically or horizontally. You also have the option to wear the bag as a backpack with the built in straps. These backpack straps can also hide away if you are using the other carrying options. Finally you can carry the bag via the included shoulder strap. I was pleasantly surprised to find it inside the bag. I have a few bags that cost 5-10 times what this bag costs and they didn't include a strap.

Continuing with the functionality theme, the bag features built in compression straps on the outside. There are two on each side so you can cinch down the contents to keep the bag in shape. Finally there is a small zippered pouch on the outside for storing items needed for easy access.

On the inside of the bag there is a medium sized, lightly padded sleeve. The sleeve is closed using a velcro strap. You could store a laptop or a tablet and then secure it with the velcro strap. The rest of the inside is just one large compartment. This can be good or bad depending on what you store in the bag. You can use the compression straps to control the shape if you are storing soft goods inside.

 The bag is very discreet. It does not have any logos or branding, not even a subtle one. I think this is a good thing since I am not a fan of large logos or branding on a bag of this style.

This bag would be good for short trips or even as a gym bag. You could probably even use it as a backpack for work or school. You could easily fit some shoes inside and a few days worth of clothes.

I've attached some photos to show how the bag opens and how the backpack straps can be hidden. There is also a shot of the inside of the bag.

Disclosure Statement: I received this product at a discount so that I could provide a fair and unbiased review. All opinions are mine and have not been influenced by the seller or manufacturer of the product.
summary: Great value for the price. Shoulder strap included. Backpack straps can be tucked away.

I thought -- "Great!"  Two pairs is just what I need.  So I ordered two sets of the two pairs, and one set went back.

After wearing these tights all day one day this winter, I went for a walk at lunch.  During that walk (to a deli only 4 blocks away), the waist of these leggings slipped down so far, it was under my rear end.  I had jeans on over them, and if I hadn't had the jeans on, these would have kept sliding down toward my feet.  It was awful.  I knew they had slid down and was thankful I had my coat on over it so no one could see that my jeans were being dragged down as a result of these leggings.  :-(  Are these too large?  Too small? I don't know.  They should have been perfect, but they were a disaster.

I returned one set and will likely only wear the remaining pair around the house and never outside.  These were just awful.  Avoid.

I finally found a pair if fleece lined tights which I can (just barely) get the crotch to the right place. For reference I'm 5'8" with very athletic thighs and bought a L/XL.  However, there is almost zero elastic in the waistband and the crotch ends up near my knees within 20 minutes.

reviewText: Great gift

I purchased the Red Apple color in size 4xl (which is xl in US size). I normally where a size medium shirt and 6/8 in jeans. For reference, i am 5'5" 145lbs, 36c. I have always had an athletic build with broad shoulders and curves. The first time i tried this shirt on it was rather stiff. That being said, i like the medium weight of the fabric. It isn't cheap at all and it is 100% cotton. Definitely a shirt for fall. The fit was a little boxy and long which felt a little awkward for me. I decided to wash it in a gentle cycle and briefly put it in the dryer. The fit was much more comfortable after the wash and dry. The sleeves did shrink and now hit just above my wrist bone. Not good for wearing with the sleeve rolled down. I don't really mind though because i like the sleeves rolled up. The length now comes to just below the crotch area (instead of mid-thigh before wash). It has the straps and buttons on the sides which look cute and cover the bum enough to wear with leggings. Please pay very careful attention to the sizing chart. Dont get disheartened at the label size either. Asian sizing is very small compared to US sizing. I am not bothered by the 4xl as long as it fits and is comfortable!

reviewText: Not a very good watch ,looks good though

I like the look of the watch and the strap looks good - a very clean look.  That's about it.  Adjusting the settings is very spastic and there are no instructions that come with the piece. I had to go to YouTube and found some instructions which I copied/pasted into Word.  Apparently setting these led watches is kind of universal; that was okay, but this watch was impossible.  The sensor spot (indicated by he index finger on the image) is not very responsive. Sometimes it acts like it's dead, then the screen will light up. Making a selection to choose 12/24 flashes rapidly and it's hit or miss that when you try to choose, it'll stop on the wrong choice. Same thing happens when you try to change the hour/minute, etc.  I finally had it set, I thought, put the watch on my wrist, and a minute later the time lit up, the wrong time. On and on it went.  Perhaps it's just this watch, but I wouldn't waste any more time/money on this model.

reviewText:
I wrote a long and detailed review of this watch which Amazon would not accept, and I don't know why. So I'll just give the short version.

This watch is beautiful. I think it looks great, and unlike other reviewers I don't think it looks cheap at ALL. I'd be proud to wear it and proud to give it as a gift. It comes wrapped around a soft pillowy piece in a heavy black cardboard gift box, which seems appropriate for a wooden watch.

My only problems with it, and it is what cost it two stars:

-one face wouldn't adjust. It has four faces... Time, date, day of week, 24 hour face. On mine, no matter what we tried, the day of week wouldn't adjust

-directions for adjusting the faces or removing links are online in the photos of the product, but are not included with the watch, making it difficult as a gift.

I was given a free or deeply discounted sample to test and review, but have offered only my own opinions and observations. I really love the way this watch looks, and feels. It seems to keep time well. And the other faces adjust fine. If giving this as a gift i suggest you first adjust all the settings, and print the directions for adjusting them and for removing links and give with the gift.

By the way, removing links wasn't easy but was possible exactly as the directions explained.

reviewText: I got this for my twelve year old daughter. Looking at the slender model and guessing that she was modeling the smallest size,I got an XL for my daughter. She normally wears a small (8/10)in most abayas ,but this just looked so small I figured I would get the largest size and take it in if necessary. I chose standard shipping and it came about ten business days after I ordered it which was much earlier than anticipated. This Abaya just fits my twelve year old who I believe is average for her age. She would never wear an American XL garment. I'm so glad that I erred on the side of caution because a smaller size would have been much too small. I knew that this fabric wasn't exactly high quality, but it's fine. Not too thin and the seams are surged. Overall, I am happy with the Abaya and will be purchasing this style again.

You don't need much and you certainly don't need to use it every time you wear or even wash your boots so 1 bottle should last you a really long time. reviewText:
Plusasa La Lune Sleeveless White T Shirt - *Arrived way ahead of estimated delivery date!

I love edgier unique clothing - whether its a vintage find at an estate sale or a throwback hipster cast-away at the thrift store  bringing it home and finding a way to incorporate it into my work wardrobe makes me grin. Given my penchant for finding interesting clothes, its not often that I buy new, its hard for me to find the uniqueness and character in brand new clothes  Plusasa is changing that for me! Plusasa has a fashion line that gives me the option to buy high-quality new clothes that have a fresh, unique, edginess that set them apart from mall clothes. The La Lune Sleeveless T-Shirt is my newest addition from Plusasa.

The La Lune Fashion T-Shirt is a well-made sleeveless T that provides an androgynous edge to a decidedly feminine cut shirt. Sizing is import-standard  I am 53 and around 135 and the XL shirt fits me perfectly. The Polyester base is blended with lycra, nylon, and elastane to keep this top washable, wearable, and looking as good as the first day I wore it. The weight of the fabric falls between a standard t-shirt material and a light broadcloth which lets the shirt drape beautifully while having the softness to gently hug those girl curves. The sleeves have a deep urban cut-off look but don't fray even with repeated wear due to the high-quality material. The printed design is bold and well-defined with no color bleed. The finished neckline is classic girl-t style and the fold-over is expertly tailored. Hem and seams are double stitched and all stitching is straight, even, and perfect. Designer tag at the inside waist line means no tag at the neckline which I love!

I received the Plusasa La Lune Round Neck T-Shirt at a promotional cost in exchange for an unbiased review and love the great quality, the unique design, and I especially love the outstanding versatility of this top.
summary: High quality fashion shirt top. Edgy urban details, stylish design, excellent fit!

The only problem I had with the slippers is the way they are shipped. They are fastened together in two different spots (one through the soles of the slippers) with those plastic thingies used in retail to attach price tags. They are so tight that it's hard to cut them off without damaging the slippers. Negatives: they definitely run a little on the short side. It works for me, but I am 5'4. Anyone much taller or longer in the legs than me, and they will start looking more like capris. Also... after one wear. ONE, they started to get holes in the rear. Not even washed yet. I am super sad because I really loved these pretties out of the package and would have worn them a lot!
summary: Soft and wonderful, but only for one wear

I've taken to wearing these shoes outside the gym any day I need a boost in confidence. They're such fun - iridescent blue and green - and they start conversations wherever I wear them. A great unisex Zero Drop shoe that has a lot of room to spread my toes and I found them not to be tight (unlike other reviewers). The Women's 7 - Men's 5.5 (US) fits just as expected. I normally wear a 6.5 in flats and I buy size 7 when I buy sneakers/boot so I have always sized those up. I hope that helps future buyers.

reviewText:
It's pretty cute and mostly appears as it does in the picture, except the sleeves aren't exactly the same. If you want a jacket that will keep you warm and dry, the material is very thin and won't do the job. It would only really be useful in maybe slightly windy weather.

There are three sets of draw strings: one at the bottom, one around the waist, and one for the hood. The ends of them aren't sewn or sealed in any way and seem to be on the verge of fraying already; I suggest stapling or coating the ends in a clear glue to keep them from fraying. (I already stapled the one in the picture.) The jacket is overall cheaply made, and I wouldn't recommend it for anything but fashion. The skull pattern on the back is very pretty. I'll be keeping it because it's cute, but for those considering buying this, just keep these things in mind. Not sure if it's worth almost $20, but I can imagine wearing this with a lot of different outfits.

But i was so in love with the dresses that i struggled with the decision of cancelling,  I sent an email to the seller asking her if she can send me a picture of a dress that she actually made and not one from a catalogue.  She didn't sent me one she sent me a bunch of them. I was happy with what I saw and decided to stay with her and that was THE BEST decision that I could take. Thru the whole process she was emailing me if I had any doubts and when she finished she sent me pictures of the dresses, I asked her if she could add more tulle and she did it with out any excuse or getting mad about it. The end result is beautiful and the dresses are made with good materials, and to top that it only took for the dresses 3 days to get here from CHINA I am amazed. I would highly recommend this seller they are awesome!  Note: In the pictures you are not going to be able to see the bow that has on the back cause is detachable and I didn't attached it before I took the pictures (hope that I can upload more pictures from the day of the event) also since I'm referring about 2 dresses I'm going to upload a picture of the other one too cause I'm going to copy this review to the other one and I don't want you to think that this is a scam.

reviewText: nice

It's a little hard to tell that the big magenta decoration on the front is a spider. I got this to go with a spiderwoman costume for a Halloween party. It's cute and glittery, and goes with the overall spider theme. The hat is not really a hat - the brim is flat and covers the entire bottom of the hat with no cutout for your head. This means the hat sits on top of your head like a book or other flat object. Because it's smaller than a regular hat, I wouldn't expect much of my head to fit inside of it, but it does look a little funny just perched up there. Plus it's not terribly stable without any recessed area to work with the curve of your head. It has both a solid headband and an elastic band to secure the hat. The elastic was pretty much worthless in terms of helping the hat to stay on my head, so I removed it. The headband is pretty sturdy, although the hat is tall enough to wobble around a bit. If you're crafty and can attach combs to the ends of the headband, that would probably help to hold it in place. It's still a cute accent for my costume, and I like it fine. I didn't pay very much for it, so I didn't expect it to be a high-end fashion accessory.
summary: Cute costume hat but a little unstable on your head

These sports bra are great and exactly what I've been looking for!  I have quite a few maximum or medium support sports bras for my running, cardio and higher impact workout and I love them but let's face it sometimes I just want a comfy sports bra under one of my cute, loose workout tanks to lift in.  These are perfect and the price is awesome for a 4 pack - heck yeah!  They are really soft and stretchy - like I mentioned before these are minimum support which is what I wanted to lift in because they move, flex and stretch better during different lifts and flys than my maximum support sports bras do.  These are also super cute in their bright colors and metallic pinstripes!  They look adorable peeking out of those loose workout tanks!  I wear a 36b and I ordered Mediums and they fit perfect! I actually received a discount in exchange for agreeing to review these, but even without that discount theses are a great deal.  I have paid over twice the cost of this 4 pack for a single sports bra b fore so these are a steal! I definitely recommend to anyone looking for comfy stylish sports bras.

reviewText: Exactly what we were looking for.  Good quality, great price.

**This review is for the 4 Pack Adjustable Convertible Premium Padded Bras**

The first thing I want to address is the size.  I got the XL hoping they would fit me but they do not.  I wear a DD(I know) these don't come close.  But luckily I had a friend that wears a 34 C and these fit her.  Now I was conflicted on what to rate this review because of the sizing, but really other than it being way smaller, the actual sports bra is really nice.  So if you are looking to purchase these, please keep in mind their sizing.

The sports bra looks more like a bra in the front.  The cups are shaped and padded like bras are and they an under wire in them.  The back has a strap and a also a razorback as well.  My friend says they are very comfortable to wear and she likes to workout in them also.

The bras have a zebra print with a mesh fabric over it.  The set I got was all in neon colors: 2 aqua colors, 1 neon pink and 1 neon orange.  The straps are not adjustable but no sports bras are.  She says these do give good support.

The sports bras seem to be made nicely and she says she washing them in her delicate cycle and hasn't had any issues.  I do recommend them, if you get the right size.

**I did receive this at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.  Compensation of any kind is never accepted in exchange for a positive review. All opinions expressed are my own and not edited by any companies mentioned.**

These LA Gear Sports Bras are super cute and stylish. The colors and pattern of them are an absolute LOVE! Main downside, they run small and unfortunately didn't fit my daughter which is who I got them for. She wears a 38C and she said they were a bit snug on her but she thought they would be ok. After wearing for a few hours, it was digging into her too much where it became uncomfortable and she needed to change it. The cup part fit her, it was just snug around the back.

These sports bras though are well made and there were no loose threads and all the stitching is done well. I like how the cup has a netting type look to it. The racerback is nice to wear with tank tops that have that back so you don't see your bra straps. There is a normal type bra hook in the back which is 2 hooks for the XL and then there are 3 hooks for adjusting. The shoulder straps are not adjustable. You receive an assortment of colors. We received 2 Turquoise, 1 Pink and 1 Orange and like I mentioned, the colors are nice and bright and so pretty. I still gave these 4 stars because they really are a nice quality sports bra, it's just we had an issue with the fit and them running small which is a chance you take when ordering online unfortunately.
I received this product with a promotional discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. No compensation for a positive review was provided. All of my reviews are based 100% off of my experience with the product and I never guarantee a positive review.
summary: Really Cute Sports Bras, Run a Little Small!

reviewText:
It was too small for my LG G5 in it's case.  I was lead to believe it was bigger than it was.
Gave it to my daughter who had a smaller phone.

**UPDATE: I have carried this daily since purchase (over 6 months) and it is still in excellent condition. I never switch to a small purse now because this holds so much!**
 For over a year I have ONLY carried a phone pouch with a few card slots and my keys hanging off the side of it. The strap was finally giving away and Apple Pay isn't being adopted as fast as I want and need to carry more cards, so I figured it was time to find a new one. Phone carrying wallets are easy to find, phone carrying wallets that are smaller than average while still having tons of space are not...until this wallet!  I have an iPhone 6s with a thin bumper style case on it and it is a perfect fit. It would probably fit one a bit bigger but not by much. When I upgrade to the 6plus I might have to find a new wallet because I do not believe it will fit. Which makes me kinda sad because I want to order a few more colors but that is the downfall of going bigger and refusing to carry a purse.

It shows the phone can be slid into an opening between the cards and a large roomy zipper pocket, but that makes me nervous. It is snug but will it stay that way after usage?  I hang this thing from my wrist and go, would hate to have my phone drop out. If I am in meetings/sitting all day I would use that part to save the zipper then switch to the pocket when I leave.  I use the large zipper part for the phone as I do not have much to carry. I hang my keys on the side with the wristlet.  If I trusted the phone pocket I could fit my keys, a Chapstick, and other stuff in the other pocket, but then it would be bulky.  There is also a large coin pocket behind the big zipper area. I use that for a few punch cards, a 4.5 inch stylus, and my challenge coin with plenty of room to spare!!

I like the slim look knowing that if I needed to I could put whatever I need to take with me in there as well. With the card slots full (some even with 2 cards per slot), the stuff mentioned in the coin section, and my phone it measures just under 2 inches thick. My last one was smaller than that so this seems big to me, but I am now carrying 14 cards instead of 6 as well as plenty of other stuff.  It's a win and I am glad I chose this one.

I actually had to buy this twice because the first one got lost in transit. Said it was delivered but still hasn't shown up. Contacted Amazon and they refunded my money and covered one-day shipping to purchase it again.
summary: Exactly what I was hoping it would be.

It has been about ten months since I purchased this ring for my husband. I have no words! It looks as beautiful, and polished, as if it just came out of the box!  No scratches whatsoever! He never, ever takes it off! He is a carpenter, electrician, plumber... Jack of all trades, and that's on his days off!! He is a welder by trade! I am telling anyone and everyone... You will not be disappointed!! I have never seen a piece of jewelry hold up to the kind of beating that this wedding band has taken! Highly recommend this ring!! It is one thousand percent amazing. I truly tell you, seeing is believing! I am so happy I bought this! My husband loves his band. The most comfortable ring he had ever wore!! Definitely worth such a small amount of money!! Thank you for such quality!

If you are contemplating purchasing this dress, DO IT!!!! I couldn't believe I bought my wedding dress for $100 when initially I planned to spend $1300. Don't be alarmed when the dress arrives and smells kind of fishy (I was devastated, when I pulled it from the package and it smelled of fish), However, after a few internet searches it informs you that in China they have to use a specific pesticide when shipping things to the US, after hanging the dress up the smell went away in a few days. reviewText: Let's start this review by saying this is, at first glance, a pretty cute KIDS bracelet. With an original price tag of 24.95 I will tell you this item is not worth it at that price. The beads feel more like a "metal plated" plastic, the metals the small charms are made of appear to be a weak and cheap alloy, and the links holding the little gymnasts to the bracelet will probably break apart and loose those little charms pretty quickly assuming the elastic string holding the whole thing together doesn't snap first. The box it comes in is a pretty standard cheap gift box, something you could purchase at your local dollar store. Was really hoping for a little better quality at this price. Your little gymnast will love it for probably about 2 weeks before it falls apart.
Cheap quality,  cute for young girl but not the best quality.

The bracelet was delivered very quickly and was packaged in a very nice box for gift giving.  The charms are very lightweight and the bracelet is on a stretchy cord.

I think this bracelet is cute; the beads are bright and the figures are brightly colored.  That the bracelet is made with stretchy cord concerned me about the age of the person it would be given to, that you would have to be careful about not giving it to too small of a child so it wouldn't be broken right away OR if it was broken, that they would not try to swallow the beads or charms.

When I presented to the young lady in my life that does gymnastics (she was 6), she looked it, tried it on, and immediately took it off and went off to play.  No comment whatsoever, I was shocked.  When she went home, she left it at my house.  I guess she didn't think it was as cute as I did.

 I was given this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review.
summary: Very lightweight, cute, but just not real special with the stretchy cord

reviewText: I ordered this cute bracelet as a gift for my 7 year old daugther. She is totally into gymnastics right now, so I know she will love it! I received it at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review. Had I paid full price, I would be disappointed by the quailty. This suit is super cute and came exactly as shown in the picture!
I'm 5'4" 124lbs 34C and I usually always wear a small in both swimsuit tops and bottoms so I'm glad I listened to the other reviewers who said it runs small because the medium (US4-6) fits exactly how an American small normally fits. I was also really happy to see that the print of the suit is just as colorful and vibrant as shown in the picture! (I posted pictures so you can see).
The material of the suit seems pretty good. The bottoms are a more softer spandex, and the top is more of a structured neoprene on the inside, with the soft spandex print on the outside. Both the top and bottoms are double lined. The bottoms have the same print on the inside as the outside (which is good in case your bottoms get accidentally readjusted in the water lol) but the top is white on the inside. The top is very structured, so if you're looking for a more flimsier top to just lay on your skin, this isn't it. The top is also lightly padded at the bottom of the cups to give you a slight lift, but there's no side slit for you to add your own padding or take out theirs. I also wouldn't recommend cutting your own slit either due to the way the top is so structured. The bottoms are a more skimpier cut (i.e there's not too much coverage), but they're also not a thong cut either, which is exactly how I like mine :)
All in all, I would definitely recommend the suit and am excited to wear it this summer!
summary: Super cute and came exactly as shown! (Just make sure to order 1 size up)

The watch itself has a dark wood and a light wood combined which makes this watch super sharp looking.  The face of the watch has  3 different circles that show a 24 hour time, the date and day of the week.  I don't normally like those features on a round watch face, because it makes it hard to decipher the time.  However, because the face of this watch is square, it breaks it up more so that you can easily still see these features and tell time.  I wasn't too sure that it was going to be comfortable to wear because it is made of wood, but I was wrong!  The wood is super smooth and feels comfortable to wear.  I will say that if you have a hairy arm, it tends to pull the hairs a little bit.  If you are looking for something unique, this is the watch for you.  Please know that everything that I have written about this product is how I really feel about it and you can read my reviews with confidence.  A sample provided at a promotional discount for testing and review
summary: The watch itself has a dark wood and a light wood combined which makes this watch super sharp looking

reviewText:
I know I read in other reviews that it wasn't accurate to the picture, but I gave it a try. When I unpackaged it, I wish I hadn't.
The sewing was a nightmare; strings hanging everywhere. I had to take scissors to the thing several times because red and black strings were haging around the collar and sleeves. And that's all I've experienced with my orders of clothes lately; poor sewing!
And other reviews are true, the fluff is not NEARLY as nice as depicted. This fluff is more matted down and flat; not plush like in the pictures. Also for lingerie, this definitely was NOT comfortable to wear. The little thin veil skirt beneath the outer dress to make it stick out is very scratchy against the skin. The hat was small on the head too, like other people said.
Lastly, the dress wasn't very fitting for my shape (I'm a bit on the thick side, being a lil curvy). My "frontal region" was out all over the place so I had to pin it a little bit shut, thus causing the hoop of the skirt to not puff out as much. If you're more like a stick figure, maybe this is for you..? Like if you're really thin waisted and have a slightly bigger bust? The lace tying the top shut wouldn't be perfectly even x's all the way down, no matter how many ways I tried tying it. And I had to tie the bottom firmly to stop the opening from staying open more.
This was just.. an expensive disappointment. But at least I got a few good pics out of it I guess.
summary: Weird Fitting, BAD Sewing; Nicer at a Distance.

reviewText:
This is the worst thing I have ever gotten on the internet. I had a feeling it was coming from China and may look a little different but the jacket is as wide as it should be long so you would need to be a marshmallow person to actually fit into it with a tiny torso. Also looks completely different than the picture. I mean it's about the same color but those buttons? Those "patches"? All fake and superficial looking. Think of the quality of a Halloween costume you get in a bag at a party store. That's how bad it was.

Not even worth the effort/money to even try to get a refund or anything. I always hear horror stories about people trying so I won't even bother. I just wanted to leave this here to warn future buyers.

Also never trust a seller who has NO reviews but a ton of inventory. Chances are they get terrible reviews all of the time and then close their shops and open new ones with the same products.
summary: Think of the quality of a Halloween costume you get in a bag at a party store. That's how bad it was.

It's beautiful, light, stretchy through the body of the shirt. I may order the white one in a smaller size because the cost is so low. But, if you're worried about the size, the 18 fits like an 18. I ordered the Sterkowski Military Scout Woolen Beret after looking at so many different berets for the last couple of months. I liked the look in the picture because it didn't look stiff like some. I debated about getting it though because I was worried about the fit and the fact it came from Poland really concerned me. What if it didn't fit? How complicated would it be to return it? Then of course there was the time it would take to get here. When I see something I really like, I want it yesterday. I took a chance. I ordered it December 16th. I considered having it shipped expedited, but that was $10 more. Patience is a virtue, and it pays off. I was sent the shipping info. The expected arrival was February 3 - February 24. Today is January 4th, and my awesome beret was delivered about 30 minutes ago, a month early. It's beautiful. I ordered a little bigger than my normal size US 6 & 7/8 (55cm). I ordered US 7 (56cm). It is perfect! It's just loose enough so it's comfortable and not tight.

I love hats! This is the first one that was made for me. It was well worth the wait and most especially the price!!! I highly recommend Sterkowski, and I will order from them again!!! I absolutely love this beret.

I have to wear my barbells 24/7 and this is the worst one to sleep in. It has very little give. However that being said it is also one of my favorites in my collection at the moment. I can easily brush my hair and nothing gets caught up in it which is a huge bonus. Overall the quality of this item is amazing and I recommend it but just remember there is little give so if you have a healing piercing this may be one to save and show off when things are fully healed.

reviewText:
I have very small wrists so this bracelet is pretty large on me. I like that I can squeeze to bend it so its a little tighter, but even if I get the two Ts practically touching its still pretty loose on my wrist (not loose enough that it will fall off mind you, it just flops around quite a bit). I wore it to a wedding last weekend, and it was loose enough that I found myself fiddling with it constantly. I think it would fit well on people with average sized wrists, but large wrists might have to stretch the bracelet out so far that it would look weird. I like the simplicity of this bracelet. It doesnt have anything else going on besides the band and the two T ends, and the silver is nice and bright and shiny. My husband really likes it, which surprised me because he doesnt often comment on my costume jewelry. I like the look of it myself, so Im glad to have it on hand and Ill wear it when Im going simplistic with my jewelry. I think it is of average quality for costume jewelry, which is fine with me. I think the price is a little high for what you get, but not terrible. I feel like the edges of the T ends could be a little smoother. They aren't exactly sharp, but the edges aren't rounded at all, so they feel a little pointed. Overall I like the bracelet, but its nothing all that special. I would say my favorite thing about it is that my husband likes it - if it wasn't for that I probably wouldnt wear it all that often.

Contrary to the product photo and the other posts, my wig arrived completely fallen. I chose this wig because others said it held its shape through two events or at least through one evening (which was all I needed it for). After using half a can of max-hold hairspray, shaping it into a point and hanging it upside-down for two nights, it was okay for the few hours I needed it. I would have returned it but didn't have time to find an alternate and now it's plastered with hairspray. The color is great and the fit was really good, but the shape was not what I expected. reviewText: Horrible. The sleeves were ripped, the costume fit awkwardly, looked/felt super cheap for its expensive price, didn't come with the necklace, and just ugly. I hate to leave such a negative review, but I honestly believe that you can make this costume at a much reasonable price without it looking so tacky.

This is a high quality outfit. Take it from a seasoned cosplayer, something like this would be worth about $200 and here it's being sold for a bargain. I would definately buy from them again. The dress itself is highly accurate to the game, the gloves actually fit me (which is something I've never found, even in expensive high-end cosplays), and it came with the Omega necklace, stripe socks, and gloves with the buckles on them. Plus the dress itself, of course. I'm 5'4", middle of the road bust, and the dress fit like a charm except the upper part where my breats were. However it wasn't an extreme no fit, it was just some breathing room. If i stood up straight, problem solved.

Tl;dr: if you're on the fence about buying this dress, just do it. It's worth it

This company is awesome.  This is the third outfit I have gotten from them, and just like the first two it is really awesome.  The fabric is soft, not scratchy, and does not pull or pinch in sensitive areas.  When you first open the package it looks to be too small to fit even the most impossibly petite woman, but it stretches enough to fit even those of us who rock a curvy shape.  (I am 5'4" at about 160lbs and wear about a size 12.)  This super sexy ensemble has a bow and ribbon theme woven into the fishnet that is enough to catch the eye and make you want to look more without becoming to busy.  The simple spaghetti strap design is classically sexy that when paired with the old-school garter-look is a winner for anyone looking to expand their bedroom wardrobe.  The straps stay in place nicely on your shoulders and I never had to fight with my breasts to keep everything in place while I was wearing it. (I am a 36DD.)  The fabric stretches where it needs to and clings to you where it needs to, helping to make you feel as sexy as you should when wearing a fishnet catsuit.  And you can not beat the price!  A winner all the way around.

These jeans just came in today. I'm normally a size 14ish pants so I got the 15 to be safe. They're comfy jeans and very soft. But, I mean I never thought I'd say this but I wish they weren't so stretchy. They make my stomach and thighs look really bad and "out there" I guess. I've got a bit of a belly and you saw every outline while I wore these. Also, the pant legs are really long! I'm 5'8 but they go past my toes. I mean I guess I would feel okay wearing these with a baggy shirt and rolled up or hemmed. But I was hoping to wear some crop tops with them.

To sum it up:
-super soft and comfy
-if you're not completely flat, it'll show.
-wear these if you're incredibly tall.
summary: Never thought I'd say this but, kinda wish they weren't so stretchy

reviewText:
Wow  I have to say that I didn't expect these hair bows clips quality would be so nice and well-made. There are so many well-known stores selling similar products, cant beat the quality and price at all with these lovely bows. These bows came in a zipper bag, colors and patterns are exactly the same as described. They are so cute and bigger than I expected but size would not bother me. Even I received these bows with a huge discount in exchange for my honest review, I will be willing to pay full price for these bows and highly recommend to all my friends.
Here are the reasons why you will not be disappointed:
1. The beautiful variety design and lovely color pattern are definitely attractive points; you can match any outfit easily. They looks great in my little ones black hair
2. The bows fabric quality is so soft and the edges were straightly cut.
3. Perfect size and stay in place on my little ones fine thin hairs
4. Very light and kids don't even notice, so they cant rip them off their heads.
5. I checked every single one before I put them on my kids because you don't want to cut any hair with sharp edge of the clip. These bows are really well-made and neat, no razor sharp clips like others and no fraying on the ribbon
6. The metal barrettes glued very well to the bows, I don't even see any glue leftover on the fabric.
I hope my review and photos will help you. If you are shopping for your little ones Christmas gifts, this won't make them disappointed.
summary: Lovely Christmas gifts for your little one

reviewText:
I received this product at discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.
The bows (color A with 5 sets of different patterns) came in a zip-lock bag on the scheduled delivery date. The alligator clips are hot-glued on the bows.

Here are some pros and cons:

Pros:
# There are FIVE different sets. Usually you buy a set of hair clips with the same pattern but different colors. These are not! You get 5 sets different patterns/sizes/shapes hair bows and there are 4 different colors in each set. You can find one that fits your kids outfit easily.
# The price. You will probably pay the same amount of money but only get 5 or maybe 8 bows. Yet with this deal, you get 20 bows! Every bow is less than one dollar.
# These are sturdy hair clips that stay on baby fine thin hair. I might need to fix it for my daughter if she is playing with it but the clips stay in place even with windy weather.
# They are just so adorable!

Cons:
There is no bow that is mainly green or red.

Bottom line: This is a good buy. Highly recommended with 5 stars!
Very high quality clips, well made.
summary: Lovely hair clips for little girls

reviewText: Does not look like the photos and wrinkles very easily. It's a cheap knock off from china. Too much of a hassle to return so now I am stuck with this useless garment.

The color - I ordered the Army Green and what I got was some shiny cheap almost lime green with a dark ugly satin lining that stands out like a sore thumb.

The size - I'm normally an 8/10 or Med/Lg, knowing that Asian sizes run small I ordered the XXL. The bottom layer which you can see is supposed to be open but should be enough to close over your chest and is about 4 inches from that point. I'm a 36C.

The cut - From the photo it shows the top layer "cloak" should overlap and cover your shoulders giving a flowy effect and expose your arms. The one I received had the shoulders exposed as if a 3rd graders superhero cape was sewn to the back with enough material on the flaps to nearly wrap around me twice.

The quality - Sewing is good all around.

All in all the one I got was a horrible knock off, my son laughed at it and I gave it to my neighbors daughter for her Halloween costume.
summary: ... with a dark ugly satin lining that stands out like a sore thumb

If I could give it zero stars, I would. It is not a hooded sweatshirt as I expected, but a long sleeve t-shirt with a hood. I would have been fine with that and assumed that I had just read it wrong if it wasn't for all the other problems. The material it is made of is very thin, thinner than a normal t-shirt. Also, the graphic is very cheap and I could see it was cracking and peeling before I even took it out of the packaging. When you touch it, it feels like it's just going to flake off in your fingers. In addition to these problems, it runs extremely small. I ordered a large, which usually fits me perfectly, but this fit like I'd just tried to squeeze myself into a small.

With all these problems, there was no way I was going to keep it, as I payed $30 for something that is absolutely terrible. When I contacted the company about returning it because it didn't fit, they offered to give me $15 back and I would "keep the product." I replied back saying that it didn't fit, so I wanted to return it and get a full refund. They then, after HAGGLING WITH ME for a few emails (obviously trying to keep as much money as possible from selling a product they knew was terrible), said $25 and I would "keep the product." Being utterly done with dealing with them, I accepted.

The moral of this story, the shirt sucks, the company sucks, I'm down 5 bucks, and I'm up a useless piece of crap.

Some of the seams did start coming apart, and areas were fraying a bit a few weeks after I started using it, but I'm rough with my bags, and it's still (so far) holding together. One of the snaps fell off so I can no longer close it completely, either. Neither of these is a huge deal, especially for the price I paid (about $15), but it gets 4 stars instead of 5 for those. I'm still happy with my purse, and will probably buy another when this one falls apart.

Shipping took a while but still came faster than the expected date range. No tracking available despite giving me a number and carrier. Quality is good, strong string and no visible loose ends or anything that could potentially unravel.

Came as 5 bundles of 10 bracelets, each bundle contained multiples of the exact same type of bracelet. The bundles themselves differed from each other but only slightly. Nothing like what the pictures they show for advertising. I received all the same style but the colors were slightly changed up, in all of the bundles it's the same colors just in a different order going down the bracelet. Pictures advertised show many different types of styles and weaves, there were all one weave with just different colored strings used for each bundle.

Overall the bracelets are of good quality and vibrant colors. The problem lies with the lack of diversity. If I were giving out these in a goody bag of some sort it would work well, but I was under the impression I would get an assortment and could give them out to friends. Very cheap price, but not a good buy if you were looking to use these for a more intimate gift giving experience between close friends, instead you have 50-odd bracelets that would work better for giving out to a class of students as rewards or such. Could find better places to buy various bracelets for the same price.

reviewText: Beautiful dress.  The ruffle around the neck is adorable.

FIT:
My daughter just turned 6, is 44 lbs and just over 46" tall.
We bought this dress in size 9, and it fits my daughter nicely (keep in mind she just turned 6).  There is no way this would even fit my 8 year old.
Make sure you use the size chart as it is not like the regular US size charts I am used to.  The size chart would probably recommend a size 6x or 7 but that would be too small.

Best value I found, and perfect for around the farm, for the kids and in the car.  They held up well to the first wash and dry.  Didn't appear to bleed (red) but I had them in a load of reddish fabrics.

I think what we are all being shipped is coming from varying manufacturers.  Mine were cotton, no question and no fraying so far.  Could they be heavier fabric, sure.  But they certainly aren't gauze.  They are useable and eventually, disposable.  Still cheaper than tissues.  And useful for breathing masks when working with hay or sanding furniture.

Do NOT allow children to knot these around their necks, they could hang and choke.  Cut in half on the diagonal, hem, knot and sew Velcro to the knots.  Much safer.
summary: Great value practical - 12 for under $10.  Do NOT allow kids to tie on.

reviewText: Great

Like most costuming goods, be sure to get this well in advance so you have time to reshape and prepare for your look. A lot of these wigs are junk, but I think a lot of unfairness in reviews comes from people expecting to pull a smashed, cheap wig out of a box at the last minute and just throw it on their head. You're going to have to put in a little work.

These are Dopest Golds available on Amazon or Ebay. This set is one step down from getting impressions done and havin em professionally made in a lab. If you have the extra few bucks, don't waste your money on the other cheap ones. These though...after the gold does wear off, you are left with .925 Sterling Silver, so you can still wear em...if you like silver, they just won't have that shiny gold finish. They'll be a silver finish. I don't like silver grillz though, so what sold me on these...is still the .925 sterling silver base metal...but when mine fades, Im gonna scrap them at the local Jewelry shop. So if they don't last forever for you, (which they wont) and you don't like how the finish looks after a while, you can sell em...for the scrap .925 silver content. (thats how I justified buying in my mind anyway..Lol)  I weighed them...they are between 12 and 14 grams. So thats like 7-10 bucks that you can get back when you're done with em. Thats what sold me...the intrinsic value, they're worth something....always and forever, a dollar amount, like a solid gold or silver ring. What else....Oh..Also they DO have a Metal Stamp, their product listing for this says it had no metal stamp, which I was wondering why it wouldn't if it was authentic 925 Sterling, but after I got em, I saw they do...right on the inside back of the grill, they are stamped ".925" and also they are signed JLC. And they come with a complimentary special cleaning cloth and the 2 silicone molding bars, and instructions on how to care for em and put em in. Also there is all kinds of youtube video tutorials on how to put em in too. Had mine for like 2 months and I haven't noticed em fade at all yet, haven't chipped, they're still just like the day I got em, except a few lil scratches...which you'll have that. " Lemme see ya grill" "And the whole top diamonds, and bottom rows GOLDS!!!"
summary: ROB the Jewelry store and tell em make me a GRILL!

reviewText: Okay grill, the grill really is just a gold plate that you put the hardening paste on. Now they're awesome, but my bottom 8 chipped pretty badly on first day  but for the money not bad! Top piece truly is exquisite, But as I said the bottom (on mine at least) 8 immediately chipped. I wear the top quite a bit, just be sure not to eat or drink with them in. Especially fluoridated water (I.e water fountains where applicable) and toothpaste will tarnish ya grill badly. But I give 3 out of 5 only because of the bottom. Top 8 is Dope tho
summary: you get what you pay for

reviewText: Elegante

This item wasn't really what I was hopping for. I sized up after reading the reviews and then found that the item fit a little too large. The style itself also wasn't really what I expected. To be fair though, I don't feel like the product was marketed in a way that was misleading. What I got looks like the photographs. It just didn't wear the way I hopped. It fits as though it was meant for a much younger girl. There also isn't any curve to the sweater at all. If you are naturally curvy than the look of this top may be a bit more flattering on you. I'm not super curvy though (at least not up top) so I feel like I just looked a little childish in it.

I can say that the material is quite nice. It arrived in good condition and is made from a thicker fabric. There is nothing wrong with the quality at all.

I'm 5ft 5in, 123 lbs, a 29 in natural waist, and wear a 34b. My suggestion for smaller builds closer to mine would be to go with the small but if you've got more natural curves than go with the medium. My guess is that the smaller size would form to someone's body shape more and look less childish for potential buyers who's curves are a little less pronounced.

Also please note!!! This item ships from China so if you get he wrong size it will be very expensive to return. I went back and forth with Amazon customer service in an effort to find a solution (they were very helpful) but it was a process that not everyone will have the time or patience for. So be prepared to keep what you get. :)
summary: I don't feel like the product was marketed in a way that was ...

reviewText: Took along time to get.  Nice for the price

(Rhinestone 5 Row, Elastic )
Number Three in my line up of bracelets from this seller.  Also the item I've had the most problems managing.  So here's the point where 'the proverbial rubber meets the road', so to speak..I try to be, and I believe I succeed for the most part, in being painfully fair in my reviews. 'Painfully' meaning I'm willing to do major contortions to see or feel the absolute best in  any product.

This item was pretty. In the picture and in person, it was indeed, pretty, and it had many competitors.  I was looking for some 'sparkle', in the form of rhinestones or crystals, and this item looked like it would fit the bill with ease.  It fit the bill with ease, until I took it out of the box. (note: badly packed!) I picked the bracelet carefully out of the box, and along with my assistant, took a deep breath and saw--IT!  "IT" was a gap, which in such a pretty organized line-up of rhinestones, just it's missing that ONE, STONE, but it made the impact of it look so much more shocking!  Of course it wasn't a crack in the Hope diamond or anything as dramatic as that, it was just that the disruption in the flow of the rhinestones really did make one draw a deep breath, the flaw was so...flagrant!

Unfortunately, this is where I had the difficulty with the seller.  I'm used to rudeness, par for many courses, but this was a record for me.  I wrote requesting a replacement, and was 'met', with demands for photos, etc.  I attempted to send photos, but as anyone who has tried to photograph jewelry, especially clear, rhinestone jewelry, knows it's hard to get a good shot, much less to download from tablet/phone, to PC, and send..whatever. I had difficulties with this task, and the seller wasn't in any kind of mood to help. Needless to say...I was stuck with a bracelet with a bracelet I can't wear...buyer beware!!-suzette

The attitude of the seller is another issue, so I'll let other customers reactions help to influence reactions to that, but good luck, nonetheless. suzette

reviewText:
I'm sort of a watch nut. Having a moderate collection of mechanical watches often requires intervention with spring bars and bracelets. I've done some of my own watch maintenance on my pieces as well: minor regulation, tightening rotors and case backs, etc.

This tool set is by no means extremely high quality - in fact if your goal is to do some serious watch maintenance I would advise against this set. However, if you need something that accomplishes basic watch needs like popping open a case back, changing a strap or sizing a bracelet, this will give you the tools you need to get the job done on your own. I have a couple of Stowa watches and an Omega Seamaster 300M. I was able to size my Omega bracelet with the screwdrivers and get the spring bars off without issue on my Stowa.

The extra spring bars that are included are in various sizes, so just make sure when you use them that you have an original one to compare size with or know the spring bar size you need specifically.
summary: Great "swiss army" toolbox for the watch enthusiast

I bought a pair of these pretty rainbow leggings last year, and loved them!  They were bright and cheerful and plush and warm -- perfect for the winter.  This year, I tried buying a larger size for my now almost 5-yr-old, but the size chart made no sense to me (due to the difference in American and Chinese sizings).  I made my best guess and ordered a size 130.  To my disappointment, the leggings were too small for my daughter (whose first pair, I subsequently discovered, are labeled size 130 -- but they are actually bigger than the new pair that I just bought)! In addition, the new pair is thinner and less plush than the first pair.  Needless to say, I'm disappointed.  I still think the rainbow stripes design is adorable, but I wish larger sizes were available.  I'm giving this pair to a 3 yr-old niece.
summary: I bought a pair of these pretty rainbow leggings last year
